image_title: 单次态保真度随磁梯度演化时间的变化
description: 该图展示了在不同磁梯度演化时间（ΔB_z evolution time）下，单次态保真度（Single-shot state fidelity）的变化情况。横轴表示磁梯度演化时间（单位为纳秒），纵轴表示态保真度，取值范围从0到1。图中显示了多个周期性的波动，表明态保真度随时间呈现振荡行为，反映了系统在特定操作下的动态特性。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Coherent spin-state transfer via Heisenberg exchange_images/Coherent spin-state transfer via Heisenberg exchange-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000020_c13e6d9a0fd564c437f7d4c8331011900926861241ab0ce8173bdf71fd042500.png
image_title: Extended Data Fig. 6 | Preparation of quadruple quantum dot state
description: This figure illustrates the preparation process of a quadruple quantum dot state, focusing on the manipulation and verification of spin states within the system. The image likely includes experimental data or simulation results showing how triplet pumping affects the evolution of singlet states into specific configurations (e.g., ∣↓↑⟩). It also demonstrates the ground state verification on both sides of the quantum dot array, with measurements indicating the singlet return probability (P_S) on the left (L) and right (R) sides under different pumping conditions.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Coherent spin-state transfer via Heisenberg exchange_images/Coherent spin-state transfer via Heisenberg exchange-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000021_67e4b8fbad23d773fe56d08c10ceea20a5b040150912b76c317904310924085e.png
image_title: Extended Data Fig. 7 | Exchange and Ground State Measurements
description:
This figure presents experimental results of exchange oscillations and ground state verification in a quantum dot system. It includes multiple subplots (a, b, c, d, e) showing the singlet return probability (P_S) as a function of pulse time for different barrier pulses and initialization conditions. Specifically:
- **Subplot a**: Left-side exchange measurements using T_12 barrier pulses, showing oscillations for both singlet-singlet (S/S) and triplet-triplet (T/T) states.
- **Subplot b**: Right-side exchange measurements using T_34 barrier pulses, also showing oscillations for S/S and T/T states.
- **Subplot c**: Right-side ground state initialization using T_23 barrier pulses, comparing singlet (S pump) and triplet (T+ pump) pumping.
- **Subplot d**: Left-side ground state verification with T_23 barrier pulses, confirming the ground state under singlet and triplet pumping.
- **Subplot e**: Similar to subplot d but measured on the right side, further validating the ground state preparation.
The data confirm the evolution of separated singlet states into specific configurations under triplet pumping and the absence of exchange oscillations under singlet pumping.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Experimental Property Reconstruction in a Photonic Quantum Extreme Learning Machine_images/Experimental Property Reconstruction in a Photonic Quantum Extreme Learning Machine-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000000_5ba40b6509c58334bfb93744498349cde7e0a306f93034bc4bac2b46a1b42495.png
image_title: 实验量子极端学习机 (QELM) 的原理图
description: 该图展示了实验量子极端学习机 (QELM) 的工作原理。图中包括以下关键部分：(a) 初始量子态 |ψ₁⟩, |ψ₂⟩, ..., |ψₙ⟩ 编码在单光子的偏振自由度中，通过一个水库动态（reservoir dynamic）演化，其中初始二维空间中的信息被转移到更大的轨道角动量 (OAM) 希尔伯特空间中。仅对 OAM 计算基进行投影测量，QELM 被训练以重构一组目标值 y₁, y₂, ..., yn。图中还显示了输入层、隐藏层和输出层的结构，以及如何通过测量结果训练 QELM 来检索可观测量的期望值 {σₓ, σᵧ, σᶻ}。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Experimental Property Reconstruction in a Photonic Quantum Extreme Learning Machine_images/Experimental Property Reconstruction in a Photonic Quantum Extreme Learning Machine-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000001_a58ccb9e95bb628266b201db0d21b149a064eb9846e25a4e1bae227999c165c3.png
image_title: 实验量子极端学习机的实现
description: 该图展示了用于实现光子量子极端学习机（QELM）的实验装置。装置分为三个主要部分：输入层、隐藏层和输出层。输入层包括一个偏振分束器（PBS）、半波片（HWP）和四分之一波片（QWP），用于编码初始极化状态。隐藏层由多个HWP、QWP和q-plate组成，模拟量子行走动态。输出层通过空间光调制器（SLM）进行OAM计算基的投影测量，并使用雪崩光电二极管（APD）记录单光子计数。整个系统用于从任意输入极化态中提取目标可观测量的期望值。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Experimental Property Reconstruction in a Photonic Quantum Extreme Learning Machine_images/Experimental Property Reconstruction in a Photonic Quantum Extreme Learning Machine-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000002_34ec9a9ce61a1eb2bae2cf29a48f1a8cfc8fea265819805f3b7e7d63e5e3db2f.png
image_title: Theoretical Simulations of QELM Performance
description: This figure presents theoretical simulations of the performance of a Quantum Extreme Learning Machine (QELM) in reconstructing polarization states. It shows the median Mean Squared Error (MSE) for different Pauli operators (σ_x, σ_y, σ_z) as a function of the number of training states (N_train). The results are optimized over all possible coin parameters and final projections. Panel (a) displays the outcomes estimated from finite statistics with 10^2 samples, while panel (b) shows results with 10^3 samples. The shaded areas represent the first-quartile ranges, indicating variability across multiple iterations. As N_train increases, the MSE decreases, demonstrating improved learning performance.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Experimental Property Reconstruction in a Photonic Quantum Extreme Learning Machine_images/Experimental Property Reconstruction in a Photonic Quantum Extreme Learning Machine-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000003_d67524c96b86caa3d0a3824d83813447c9d3132365fa7f4ec37aeacff04ac30e.png
image_title: Theoretical Simulations of MSE for QELM Performance
description: This image presents theoretical simulations of the mean square error (MSE) for a Quantum Extreme Learning Machine (QELM) in reconstructing polarization states. It consists of four panels: (a), (b), and (c) show the median MSE values against the number of training states (N_train) for different finite statistics samples (10^2, 10^3, and 10^4, respectively). Panel (d) illustrates the performance with infinite statistics, demonstrating a significant drop in MSE as N_train increases. The results are color-coded for three observables (σ_x, σ_y, σ_z), highlighting the convergence of MSE with increasing training data size.

description: The logo of Nature Communications, a scientific journal. The design features the word 'nature' in lowercase with colorful wavy lines above it, followed by 'COMMUNICATIONS' in uppercase letters.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Experimental demonstration of a graph state quantum error-correction code_images/Experimental demonstration of a graph state quantum error-correction code-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000001_e4cea2250ea79cf383b35d6bc6af3dcbee4b3ddd38ebad861f0e833e267f3b75.png
image_title: 实验装置与图态量子纠错码的生成
description: 该图片展示了用于生成四量子比特图态资源的实验装置，以及后续的图态转换过程。图中分为三个部分：(a) 实验装置示意图，使用两个光子晶体光纤（PCF）源产生纠缠光子对，并通过一系列光学元件（如PBS、HWP、QWP等）进行操作，最终形成五量子比特线性簇态；(b) 图态转换步骤，包括局部补全操作（LC1和LC2），将五量子比特线性簇态转化为包含图码和辅助量子比特的资源态；(c) 验证图态真实多体纠缠的算符期望值，展示了不同测量基下的结果，与理想值进行对比，验证了实验的准确性。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Experimental demonstration of a graph state quantum error-correction code_images/Experimental demonstration of a graph state quantum error-correction code-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000002_e4cea2250ea79cf383b35d6bc6af3dcbee4b3ddd38ebad861f0e833e267f3b75.png
image_title: 实验装置与图态量子纠错码的生成
description: 该图片展示了用于生成四量子比特图态资源状态的实验装置，以及相关的图态转换步骤。图中分为三个部分：(a) 实验装置示意图，使用两个光子晶体光纤（PCF）源产生纠缠光子对，并通过一系列光学元件（如PBS、HWP等）进行操作；(b) 图态转换过程，包括局部补操作（LC1 和 LC2）将线性簇态转换为图态加辅助量子比特；(c) 验证图态真实多体纠缠的算符期望值，显示了不同测量基下的结果，与理想值进行对比。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Experimental demonstration of a graph state quantum error-correction code_images/Experimental demonstration of a graph state quantum error-correction code-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000003_5412cf7c71f7024a9edfab26846e19474a83f16716edc51d7bb3b70ff2259a1f.png
image_title: 量子编码与信息传输过程
description: 该图片展示了量子编码和信息传输的过程，分为三个部分：(a) 描述了五量子比特图态的编码过程，其中量子比特3在X基测量后被编码到剩余的四个量子比特中；(b) 展示了不同探针态（|0⟩, |1⟩, |+⟩, |+_y⟩）在编码后的密度矩阵分布，通过三维柱状图表示实部和虚部；(c) 使用布洛赫球表示原始量子态和经过编码后的量子态，显示了编码过程中量子态的旋转和变化。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Experimental demonstration of a graph state quantum error-correction code_images/Experimental demonstration of a graph state quantum error-correction code-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000004_de57e4c4c27243774a554b2baf7e6ab528fc421de14e85f0c03c4216087e2869.png
image_title: Loss Tolerance and Recovery in Graph Code
description: This figure illustrates the process of loss tolerance and recovery in a four-qubit graph code. It includes multiple panels showing different aspects of the scenario: (a) The general setup where any one of the four qubits can be lost, with qubit 4 being specifically highlighted as lost; (b) Bloch sphere representations of the original and recovered qubit states after qubit 4 is lost; (c) The real and imaginary parts of the w matrix representing the channel for this case; (d) A similar setup but with qubit 1 lost instead; (e) Bloch sphere representations for the original and recovered states when qubit 1 is lost; and (f) The real and imaginary parts of the w matrix for the case where qubit 1 is lost. The figures demonstrate how the encoded qubit can be recovered using measurements on the remaining qubits, with fidelity quantified through the w matrix and Bloch sphere analysis.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Experimental demonstration of a graph state quantum error-correction code_images/Experimental demonstration of a graph state quantum error-correction code-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000005_396d08b3a610e6e0ed1d2644dd2b85f809d950db677708fd58b4e5b691547808.png
image_title: 量子错误检测示意图
description: 该图展示了在量子编码中，不同类型的错误（Z 错误、Y 错误和 X 错误）对稳定子测量结果的影响。图分为三部分：(a) Z 错误导致某些稳定子的期望值符号翻转；(b) Y 错误同样导致某些稳定子的期望值符号翻转；(c) X 错误导致所有稳定子的期望值符号翻转。每个部分都包含一个图形表示错误类型，并附有对应的稳定子测量结果热图，显示了错误发生时稳定子测量值的变化。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Distributed Quantum Computing across an Optical Network Link_images/Distributed Quantum Computing across an Optical Network Link-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000000_3630c842d79bbfc146c48bcc0cd8c235e1927afabe198cb3694339ade46a1f34.png
image_title: 分布式量子计算架构
description: 图展示了分布式量子计算（DQC）的架构，其中多个模块通过光子链路相互连接。每个模块包含少量网络量子比特（紫色）和电路量子比特（橙色），并通过局部操作实现直接交互。非局部操作通过量子门电传（QGT）在不同模块的电路量子比特之间进行，利用共享纠缠、局部操作和经典通信来实现。图中还展示了模块间的全互联性，以及如何通过光子开关板提供灵活和可重构的网络拓扑结构。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Distributed Quantum Computing across an Optical Network Link_images/Distributed Quantum Computing across an Optical Network Link-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000001_7d847f13f1039530ee6fd560ec99684e64e991282133c820e926076a62edac94.png
image_title: 远程量子门的量子态传输（QGT）示意图
description: 该图展示了通过量子态传输（QGT）在两个分离模块（Alice 和 Bob）之间实现远程受控-Z (CZ) 门的过程。图 a 描述了实验装置，包括两个模块，每个模块包含一个 Sr+ 离子（网络量子比特 Q_N）和一个 Ca+ 离子（电路量子比特 Q_C 和辅助量子比特 Q_X）。Sr+ 离子用于与光学量子网络接口，而 Ca+ 离子提供稳定的电路量子比特。通过光子链路生成网络量子比特之间的远程纠缠，并利用辅助量子比特进行局部 CZ 门操作。测量结果通过经典链路交换，完成非局部门的量子态传输。图 b 和 c 分别展示了理想 CZ 门的处理矩阵和实验中重建的处理矩阵，其中实验矩阵的平均门保真度为 86.1(9)%。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Distributed Quantum Computing across an Optical Network Link_images/Distributed Quantum Computing across an Optical Network Link-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000002_7a76a3b46d5b622651cc9b7c217dcc48ecad7e6c49babf2160f9934285341eec.png
image_title: 分布式量子计算中的iSWAP、SWAP门和Grover算法
description: 该图片展示了在分布式量子计算框架下，通过光子网络链路实现的iSWAP门、SWAP门以及Grover算法的电路图和实验结果。具体包括：(a) iSWAP门的电路分解及其过程矩阵的实部和虚部；(b) SWAP门的电路分解及其过程矩阵的实部和虚部；(c) Grover算法的电路设计及其执行结果，显示了不同标记状态（a = 00, 01, 10, 11）下的测量概率分布，与理想值进行了对比。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Distributed Quantum Computing across an Optical Network Link_images/Distributed Quantum Computing across an Optical Network Link-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000003_1edada3d34f07e69db4c50aed27d40d3621dcb84031d8b0c675ff6ac09ce265a.png
image_title: 分布式量子计算中的混合物种离子阱系统
description:
该图片展示了用于分布式量子计算的混合物种离子阱系统的详细设计和操作流程。图中包括以下几个部分：
- **a**：整体阱结构示意图，显示了磁场（B-field）和激光冷却光束的方向。
- **b**：阱内离子布局，包含 Sr+ 和 Ca+ 离子，并标注了它们的能级结构。
- **c**：冷却、状态制备和读出过程的能级跃迁示意图，分别使用不同波长的激光进行操作。
- **d**：光学成像系统，展示从前侧和后侧对阱内离子进行成像的过程。
此系统利用混合物种离子（Sr+ 和 Ca+）实现量子态的操控和测量，是分布式量子计算网络的关键组件。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Distributed Quantum Computing across an Optical Network Link_images/Distributed Quantum Computing across an Optical Network Link-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000004_96dd9c672ca7823254dd0e03ad4e7ddc2104c3e6e455f4132ee339a955eeab37.png
image_title: 远程纠缠生成与电路量子比特的稳健存储
description: 该图展示了在分布式量子计算实验中，通过光学网络链路实现远程纠缠生成和电路量子比特的稳健存储过程。图a描述了使用200 µs的纠缠尝试周期，其间穿插着2.254 ms的协同冷却过程，以生成网络量子比特之间的纠缠。Knill动力学解耦脉冲用于保护电路量子比特的状态。图b详细说明了每个纠缠尝试的总时序，包括320 ns的量子态制备脉冲、约5 ps的激发脉冲以及后续的光子收集和干涉测量步骤，以验证远程纠缠的成功生成。图c展示了在Alice和Bob模块中，将电路量子比特状态存储到网络量子比特中的过程矩阵，其保真度分别为98.1(4)%和98.2(5)%。图d则显示了远程纠缠的网络量子比特的重建密度矩阵，其保真度为97.15(9)%，接近于|Ψ⁺⟩贝尔态。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Distributed Quantum Computing across an Optical Network Link_images/Distributed Quantum Computing across an Optical Network Link-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000005_91f3019b28e6fa2a6d3efcd9b57e5576311f56e2f0308a1dcbe9ecca1da28870.png
image_title: 混合物种CZ门的实现
description: 该图展示了在分布式量子计算系统中，混合物种CZ门的实施细节。图a显示了用于本地CZ门的电路元件，实施于网络量子比特（Q_N）和辅助量子比特（Q_X）之间。图b描述了混合物种门机制的几何结构，其中一对正交排列的拉曼激光产生极化驻波，诱导自旋依赖的光移，从而实现几何相位门。图c给出了作用于Q_N和Q_X量子比特的能级图，通过将拉曼激光调谐至402 nm，耦合到Ca+离子的397 nm S1/2 ↔ P1/2跃迁和Sr+离子的408 nm S1/2 ↔ P3/2跃迁。图d展示了Alice和Bob的局部混合物种CZ门的过程矩阵，其平均门保真度分别为97.5(2)%和98.0(2)%。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Distributed Quantum Computing across an Optical Network Link_images/Distributed Quantum Computing across an Optical Network Link-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000006_f7b13102012062283908cd58143f39d84afc6ae14442c5453c0b49424beb24d6.png
image_title: 量子信息转移的性能与误差分析
description: 该图展示了在分布式量子计算中，量子信息从电路量子比特（Q_C）到辅助量子比特（Q_X）的转移过程及其性能评估。图a显示了Q_C和Q_X之间的相干转移电路元素和能级图，其中涉及两个量子比特的状态映射。图b详细描述了转移脉冲序列的两步过程：第一步通过复合脉冲序列将|0_C⟩映射到|0_X⟩，同时抑制不必要的T_1跃迁；第二步通过π脉冲将|1_C⟩映射到|1_X⟩，完成整个转移过程。图c则展示了转移序列的性能，通过修改后的随机化基准测量（RBM）方法，测量不同转移次数下的生存概率，并提取出每一步转移的误差率，分别为Alice的3.8(2)×10^-3和Bob的2.6(1)×10^-3。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000000_e35b0ed6cc61836eecc5497f9e07ad7715aebbb453a0135f96feac685ad765ef.png
image_title: 期刊封面：npj Quantum Information
description: 图片显示了《npj Quantum Information》期刊的标志，表明文章发表在该量子信息领域的学术期刊上。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000001_0338262525e07c619a4bb2adfa7cd0405a921389105317cd8e066a17966b0c33.png
image_title: 量子电路优化前后的门计数对比
description: 图片展示了量子傅里叶变换（QFT）在不同量子比特数量下的门计数，包括优化前和优化后的结果。通过减少Rz门的数量，优化后的电路显著降低了总门计数，特别是在512个或更多量子比特的情况下，节省比例超过36%。这表明优化技术在大规模量子电路中的有效性，尤其是在资源受限的量子计算环境中。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000002_995e4f0d16a5b458b26d31fc09cb9e39d9dafcf0c06a138a8e8310253a6c9ee7.png
image_title: 量子电路优化结果：QFT 和加法器的门计数对比
description: 图片展示了量子傅里叶变换（QFT）和两种不同类型的加法器（基于 QFT 的加法器和 Quipper 库中的加法器）在优化前后的门计数对比。具体而言，图表可能包括了不同 qubit 数量下的门计数变化，以及优化后节省的门数量比例。这反映了量子电路优化技术在减少资源消耗方面的效果，特别是在处理大规模量子电路时的显著改进。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000003_995e4f0d16a5b458b26d31fc09cb9e39d9dafcf0c06a138a8e8310253a6c9ee7.png
image_title: 量子电路优化的CNOT门计数对比
description: 该图片展示了使用Quipper库实现的加法器电路在不同优化策略下的总CNOT门计数变化。具体包括：未优化前的CNOT门计数、轻量级（Light）优化后的CNOT门计数，以及重量级（Heavy）优化后的CNOT门计数。图中清晰地显示了两种优化策略对CNOT门计数的显著减少，其中Heavy优化相较于Light优化进一步降低了CNOT门的数量，体现了优化算法的有效性。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000004_6ff4d37e9f695311e22928b61bd3177e9a3dfa09ecf13e054bec8af3b839c239.png
image_title: 量子电路优化：产品公式算法的CNOT门和Rz门计数
description: 该图片展示了不同阶次的产品公式算法在优化前后，CNOT门和Rz门的计数变化。表格分为两部分：上半部分显示了CNOT门的减少情况，下半部分显示了Rz门的计数。数据按阶次（1st、2nd、4th、6th）和优化前后的状态（Before、After (L)、After (H)）进行分类，其中L表示轻量级优化，H表示重量级优化。此外，表格还提供了软件运行时间（以千秒为单位），表明优化过程的效率。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000005_3998c9ac730bb72cb1829918bbceccfa22eb7886d8ebd43a76b2c31bc5d97dde.png
image_title: 量子电路优化前后的总门数对比
description: 该图展示了近似量子傅里叶变换（QFT，内嵌图）、Quipper库加法器和基于傅里叶的加法器（QFA）的总门数。红色/蓝色点分别代表优化前/后的门数，而正方形/圆形/三角形符号分别表示Quipper库加法器/QFA/QFT的门数。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000006_69abc4022f225bc6dd82e69fda88edcf375fa845fc8b29763516af53cfd119a6.png
image_title: 量子电路优化后的总门数对比
description: 该图展示了不同系统规模下，量子电路优化前后的总门数变化。红色和蓝色的点分别代表优化前和优化后的总门数，而不同的符号（如三角形、圆形和正方形）则表示不同类型的量子电路（例如QFT、Quipper库加法器和基于傅里叶的加法器）。图中显示了优化后总门数显著减少的趋势，特别是在较大系统规模时，优化效果尤为明显。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000007_4c7a3696dcd238328af7831f36c9a57a98e1141d76beef5001eca52f672dc747.png
image_title: 不同系统规模下的CNOT门计数
description: 该图展示了随着系统规模（横轴）增加，CNOT门的计数（纵轴）的变化情况。图中使用了不同颜色和形状的点来表示不同的优化状态或算法结果：红色方块、蓝色圆圈和绿色三角形分别代表不同的数据集或优化阶段。整体趋势显示，随着系统规模的增大，CNOT门的计数也显著增加，反映了量子电路复杂度与系统规模之间的关系。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000008_8693e1420fb96e48cb5ffe1dbe646b6b7721c2b9568279e7540d4388e32da363.png
image_title: 量子电路总门数与系统规模的关系
description: 该图展示了不同系统规模下，量子电路的总门数变化。横轴表示系统规模（System size），纵轴表示总门数（Total gate count）。图中使用了三种颜色的点来表示不同的数据集或优化状态：红色、蓝色和绿色点分别代表不同的情况或优化阶段。随着系统规模的增加，总门数呈现出显著的增长趋势，表明在更大规模的量子计算任务中，电路复杂度急剧上升。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000009_60d2ab2b7d21b1a032c9b1d457a26cc13ea9afa9ca6dfbbbeac29342b3c388c9.png
image_title: 量子电路示意图
description: 该图片展示了一个简单的三量子比特量子电路，其中包含两个量子比特的受控非门（CNOT）作为最左侧的门，以及单量子比特的NOT门、Hadamard门（H）和z-旋转门（R_z）。电路图中，水平线表示量子比特随时间的演化，从左到右传播，而连接线上的符号代表量子门操作。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000010_7443d952eaf5ec3d311d6aae15bb77331efc07ef563f1251d81e8179a2c862de.png
image_title: 量子电路中的Rz门和Hadamard门组合
description: 图片展示了一个简单的量子电路，包含两个单量子比特门（Rz(θ) 和 Rz(θ')）以及两个Hadamard门（H），通过控制-非门（CNOT）连接。该电路示例说明了如何使用基本的量子门构建更复杂的量子操作，体现了量子电路优化中对Rz门和Hadamard门的组合使用。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000011_995e4f0d16a5b458b26d31fc09cb9e39d9dafcf0c06a138a8e8310253a6c9ee7.png
image_title: 量子电路的相位多项式表示
description: 图片展示了量子电路的一种数学表示方法，即相位多项式表示。该表示法适用于仅由NOT、CNOT和Rz门组成的电路，通过将电路分解为一个仿射可逆变换和一个对角相位变换来描述其作用。具体地，电路C对n个量子比特基态|x1, x2, ..., xn⟩的作用可以表示为：|x1, x2, ..., xn⟩ → e^(i p(x1, x2, ..., xn)) |h(x1, x2, ..., xn)⟩，其中h是一个仿射可逆函数，p是线性组合的仿射布尔函数，系数模2π。这种表示方法特别适合于分析和优化包含CNOT和Rz门的量子电路结构。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000012_60d2ab2b7d21b1a032c9b1d457a26cc13ea9afa9ca6dfbbbeac29342b3c388c9.png
image_title: Hadamard Gate Reduction Rules
description: This image illustrates two rules for reducing the count of Hadamard gates in a quantum circuit. The rules demonstrate how to replace sequences involving Hadamard gates with equivalent circuits that have fewer Hadamard gates. Specifically, the bottom rules show transformations where the middle CNOT gate can be replaced by any number of CNOT gates sharing the same target qubit as the original CNOT gate. These reductions help simplify the circuit and improve its efficiency.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000013_3e5e5ca68d1e4f0ee21b14a5233bd5dab99410c8083da00c418646a7c25fae3a.png
image_title: Hadamard Gate Reduction Rules
description: This image illustrates rules for reducing the number of Hadamard gates in a quantum circuit. The top row shows two equivalent circuits where a sequence of Hadamard (H) and phase (P or P†) gates can be simplified into a single sequence involving Pauli gates (P, P†). The bottom row demonstrates similar reductions, but with CNOT gates involved. These rules are used to optimize quantum circuits by minimizing the count of Hadamard gates, which do not participate in phase polynomial optimization and can hinder gate commutation.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000014_79b1f6c7743ba5aed5226cba74f839704f90a42cb97ab9828752c6bd0aa62374.png
image_title: Hadamard Gate Reduction Rules
description: This image illustrates rules for reducing the number of Hadamard gates in a quantum circuit. The top row shows how two Hadamard gates can be canceled out when they are adjacent to each other, leaving only one Hadamard gate. The middle row demonstrates how a sequence of Hadamard gates and rotation gates (R_z) can be simplified by moving the rotation gates through the Hadamard gates. The bottom row shows how a CNOT gate can be moved past a Hadamard gate, effectively canceling out the Hadamard gates on either side. These rules help in simplifying quantum circuits by reducing the count of Hadamard gates.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000015_e0bdde71ba4baf11ac455d2963d60e56b2edfcd10e30957021368583c1910723.png
image_title: 旋转门合并示例
description: 该图片展示了两个 Rz 旋转门的合并过程。具体而言，电路中原本有两个单独的 Rz 门（Rz(θ2) 和 Rz(θ4)），它们作用于相同的量子比特 y。通过分析相位多项式表达式，发现这两个旋转门可以合并为一个单一的旋转门 Rz(θ2 + θ4)，从而简化了电路结构。这种优化方法利用了相位多项式的性质，使得在电路的不同部分中对同一量子比特应用的旋转门能够被合并，从而减少电路的复杂度。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000016_16a2d86d9efa05c5e5cbb47e1c3c263e7d1893f9d96f06e15bd0330a9e3d52db.png
image_title: 量子电路示例（包含NOT、CNOT和Rz门）
description: 该图片展示了一个量子电路，包含多个量子比特（q1、q2、q3）及其上的操作。电路中使用了Hadamard门（H）、相位旋转门（Rz）以及受控非门（CNOT）。具体地，电路展示了不同量子比特之间的连接和操作顺序，包括从左到右的Hadamard门、相位旋转门以及受控非门的排列。此外，电路中的某些部分被虚线框出，可能用于说明特定的子电路或优化过程。此图旨在说明如何通过分析电路结构来识别可以合并的相位旋转门（Rz），以简化电路设计。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000017_193243686058eeb2e4444ce01bd8c8305db0ab2ac12bd90fd8f84993ee03b70a.png
image_title: 量子电路优化示例：子电路构建与相位多项式生成
description: 图片展示了一个量子电路的优化过程，具体涉及子电路的构建和相位多项式的生成。图中显示了从指定的CNOT门开始，逐步扫描所有作用于该量子比特的NOT、CNOT和Rz门，并标记终止点和锚点的过程。此外，图片还展示了如何通过修剪程序确保子电路具有相位多项式表示，并最终生成相位多项式以进行进一步优化。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000018_d853004990c53c157a4d48c4f181b259d7c9c7af239b9679ebb85068a3dee7b3.png
image_title: R_z Gate Optimization Example
description: This image illustrates an example of optimizing a quantum circuit by rearranging R_z gates. The left side shows the original circuit with multiple R_z gates, while the right side demonstrates the optimized version where the R_z gates are reordered to reduce the number of two-qubit gates (CNOTs). Specifically, it shows how the R_z(θ_2) gate can be moved to the end of the circuit, allowing for cancellation of the first two CNOT gates.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000019_479a22438d20f7672ba7e4833a75fde86f63402d9566c2804a7445d5c3c438a2.png
image_title: 量子电路优化中的单量子比特门交换规则
description: 图片展示了在量子电路优化过程中，通过应用特定的单量子比特门（R_z）交换规则来减少电路的门计数。左侧和中间部分显示了原始电路结构，右侧部分展示了优化后的结果，其中 R_z 门的位置被重新排列以实现更高效的电路表示。这种优化方法有助于减少电路复杂度，提高量子算法的执行效率。

description: This image illustrates a set of rewriting rules for rearranging Rz gates in quantum circuits. Each row shows an initial sequence of Rz gates and CNOT gates on the left, followed by an equivalent rearranged sequence on the right. The goal is to optimize the circuit structure by reducing gate counts or improving the layout for further optimizations.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000021_551c811979a0915b7131938dca8e4b0d8f8989aa580a9c05df6defb89eedf7e5.png
image_title: Toffoli Gate Implementations
description: This image illustrates different implementations of the Toffoli gate using one- and two-qubit gates. The Toffoli gate is decomposed into a sequence of NOT, CNOT, H (Hadamard), T, and T† gates. The figure shows three distinct ways to implement the Toffoli gate, each represented as a quantum circuit diagram. These decompositions are crucial for optimizing quantum circuits by expressing complex gates in terms of simpler elementary gates.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with_images/Automated optimization of large quantum circuits with-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000022_71a031f65e6c9a53a94e6ebc35994773edfec4edd28792a04d01b5db139b3066.png

description: This image illustrates the process of decomposing Toffoli gates into elementary gates (such as NOT, CNOT, H, and R) for optimization purposes. It shows various circuit diagrams demonstrating how Toffoli gates can be expanded using one- and two-qubit gates, with attention to the polarity of T and T† gates. The goal is to minimize the gate count by strategically choosing the polarities of these gates in a greedy manner, ensuring that the optimized circuit uses fewer T gates while maintaining functionality.

The decomposition is shown using various circuit identities, highlighting how Toffoli gates can be expressed in terms of these elementary gates. The optimization involves determining the polarity (T or T†) of each gate to minimize the overall gate count, particularly focusing on reducing the number of T gates. This step is crucial for optimizing quantum circuits by simplifying complex structures while preserving functionality.

image_title: 量子电路优化示意图
description: 该图片展示了量子电路的优化过程，可能包括量子门的简化、电路深度的减少或量子资源的高效利用。图片内容可能涉及量子电路的结构、量子门的排列以及优化算法的结果展示。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Gaussian breeding for encoding a qubit in propagating light_images/Gaussian breeding for encoding a qubit in propagating light-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000000_345a0819ba6744a1ffd8616475ca2484044749926eac82eb7c9d4990d393d060.png
image_title: Gaussian Breeding for Encoding a Qubit in Propagating Light
description:
This figure illustrates the process of Gaussian breeding, which is used to encode a qubit in propagating light. It includes multiple sub-figures (a-h) that detail various aspects of the protocol:

- **(a)**: Wave functions of GKP qubits, showing ideal and approximated codewords as superpositions of position eigenstates or squeezed states with Gaussian envelopes.
- **(b)**: Generation of codewords by iterative coherent bifurcation on a squeezed state.
- **(c)**: Generation of arbitrary GKP qubits using a seed state as an initial state.
- **(d)**: Seed state generation from a squeezed state using coherent bifurcation, damping, and Gaussian operations.
- **(e)**: Setup of generalized photon subtraction to generate squeezed Schrödinger cat states.
- **(f)**: Iterable generalized photon subtraction setup using quantum non-demolition interaction, implementing coherent bifurcation and damping with Gaussian ancillary states and photon number measurements.
- **(g)**: Gaussian breeding in the form of Gaussian Boson sampling, cascading optical circuits to generate arbitrary GKP qubits.
- **(h)**: State-synthesizer configuration for generating codewords using N beam splitters for N iterations of coherent bifurcation.

The diagram provides a comprehensive overview of the theoretical and experimental setups involved in encoding qubits using Gaussian breeding techniques.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Gaussian breeding for encoding a qubit in propagating light_images/Gaussian breeding for encoding a qubit in propagating light-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000001_148358ae8561a6d20a822f4a5d0c5d67420309d4aaf85fd62e60733ecb7ff96b.png
image_title: Wigner Functions of Simulated States
description: This image displays Wigner functions for simulated quantum states, divided into three sections: (a)-(c) show results of codeword generation, (d)-(f) show results of seed-state generation, and (g)-(i) show results of further seed-state generation. Each state corresponds to specific parameters such as (n/N; ) = (6; 2), (10; 4), (16; 4), and involves coherent bifurcation processes. The Wigner functions are plotted in a grid format with x and p axes labeled in units of √π, indicating phase space distributions of the quantum states.

image_title: PNAS Logo
description: The logo of the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences (PNAS), indicating the publication source of the research paper.

image_title: Entanglement-Assisted Concatenated Quantum Codes
description: This image illustrates the concept of entanglement-assisted concatenated quantum codes (EACQCs), which combine the principles of concatenation and entanglement to enhance quantum error correction. The diagram likely shows a hierarchical structure where inner codes are nested within outer codes, with entanglement resources (ebits) being utilized to improve performance. The image may also depict how EACQCs can surpass the nondegenerate quantum Hamming bound and achieve higher thresholds for error probabilities compared to standard concatenated quantum codes (CQCs). This visualization is crucial for understanding the advantages of EACQCs in terms of net transmission, minimum distance, and fault-tolerant quantum computation.

image_title: EACQC 编码电路图
description: 该图片展示了纠缠辅助级联量子码（EACQC）的编码电路。电路中，信息态 |µ⟩ 首先通过外编码器 U_O 进行编码，期间 Alice 和 Bob 共享 c_2 k_1 对 EPR 状态 |Ψ⁺⟩。外编码器的输出被分割为多个子块，每个子块进一步通过内编码器 U_I 进行编码，期间 Alice 和 Bob 共享 c_1 对 EPR 状态 |Φ⁺⟩。电路还包括测量和纠错操作，以确保量子信息的可靠传输。

image_title: 不同量子码在去极化信道下的纠缠保真度比较
description:
该图展示了在去极化信道下，不同量子码的纠缠保真度（Entanglement Fidelity, $F_e$）随去极化概率 $p_a$ 的变化情况。具体包括：
- 粉色线：去极化信道本身。
- 浅蓝色线：[[5,1,3]]稳定子码。
- 红色线：[[25,1,9]]级联量子码。
- 绿色线：[[5,1,3]]与Bowen的[[3,1,3;2]]EAQECC级联。
- 蓝色线：[[5,1,3]]与[[3,1,3;2]]EA重复码级联。
图中显示了不同量子码在面对去极化噪声时的性能差异，其中EACQCs（特别是级联结构）表现出更好的纠错能力，尤其是在低噪声条件下。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Exploring large-scale entanglement in quantum simulation_images/Exploring large-scale entanglement in quantum simulation-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000001_5a7e38e010fb708f8b8199b967f67c54d810365e5a4d5b9d6ac1fbc7d7bf2a57.png
image_title: 量子多体系统中的纠缠结构研究
description: 该图片展示了在量子模拟实验中对量子多体系统的纠缠结构进行研究的流程和结果。图a描述了51离子链上的XXZ模型，其中子系统A被标记出来，用于分析其纠缠特性。图b详细说明了状态制备和数据分析的过程，包括使用变分量子电路（VQE）制备基态和加热态，并通过EH学习方法提取纠缠哈密顿量（EH）。图c展示了不同各向异性参数（Δ=1 和 Δ=1.7）下的纠缠熵（S_A^{VN}）随子系统大小 L_A 的变化，以及对应的纠缠温度分布 β_j。实验结果与理论预测进行了对比，显示了从面积律到体积律的转变，验证了纠缠哈密顿量的局部性和有效性。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Exploring large-scale entanglement in quantum simulation_images/Exploring large-scale entanglement in quantum simulation-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000002_69d2ea2f97866525ef970b19d0c0a88f9d4e8e4388f4545e23c3916b809e6ef0.png
image_title: Entanglement Temperature Profiles and Verification for VQE States
description: This figure presents the entanglement temperature profiles and verification results for variational quantum eigensolver (VQE) states in a quantum simulation. Panel (a) shows the energy distribution of VQE states calculated from mean and variance of the Hamiltonian operator, comparing MPS circuit and heated state results. Panel (b) displays the local inverse temperatures βj for different subsystem sizes in the bulk and at the boundary of a 51-ion chain, obtained using entanglement Hamiltonian tomography (EHT). The profiles are parabolic for ground states and flatten into a plateau for excited states. Panel (c) summarizes the verification procedure, showing geometric mean fidelity F_mean and maximum fidelity F_max for both VQE ground and heated states across various subinterval sizes. The results indicate high fidelity (>90%) for reconstructed density matrices compared to exact ground states, with slight deviations observed near the boundary region.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Exploring large-scale entanglement in quantum simulation_images/Exploring large-scale entanglement in quantum simulation-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000003_a96ec56e9543e2f37bb36fab4a9aa59711c2753bc49ca333729b473e187b47d2.png
image_title: Disjoint Subsystem Entanglement and Temperature Profiles
description: This image illustrates the entanglement structure of disjoint subsystems in a quantum system. Panel (a) shows local temperature profiles (βj) for disconnected subsystems A and B, with varying separations d12. The inset highlights asymmetry in the temperature profiles for short distances, indicating an entropic force-like effect. Panel (b) presents EH parameters βij for different subsystem separations, demonstrating the coupling between subsystems as distance decreases. Panel (c) quantifies mutual information IAB and fidelity Fmax as functions of separation d12, showing how entanglement evolves with distance. The experimental results are compared with theoretical predictions, confirming the validity of the entanglement Hamiltonian approach.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Exponential suppression of bit or phase errors with cyclic error correction - nature_images/Exponential suppression of bit or phase errors with cyclic error correction - nature-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000001_129bfc89b5f46179d6716aabc3f2be29998c7949e917c0bad5fb5f1520dce30e.png
image_title: 量子纠错实验中的错误抑制与检测
description: 该图片展示了在Sycamore处理器上进行的量子纠错（QEC）实验的关键部分，包括重复码和表面码的布局、操作误差率、相位翻转码的电路示意图以及错误检测事件的统计分析。图a显示了距离为3到11的重复码和距离为2的表面码在Sycamore处理器上的布局；图b总结了单量子比特门、CZ门以及测量识别的误差率；图c给出了相位翻转码的电路示意图，其中数据量子比特初始化为+或-态，并通过XX稳定器测量进行纠错；图d说明了错误检测事件的发生机制，当测量结果与前一轮不一致时触发检测事件；图e展示了50轮检测中每个检测节点的错误检测事件比例，平均检测事件比例约为11%，并观察到边界轮次的特殊行为。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Exponential suppression of bit or phase errors with cyclic error correction - nature_images/Exponential suppression of bit or phase errors with cyclic error correction - nature-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000002_2412516862c415199aef9659b0f4bb1d2cb43b01dadc073d9bef9758fe849d60.png
image_title: Error Detection Correlations in Quantum Error Correction
description: This figure illustrates the analysis of error detection events in a quantum error correction experiment. Panel (a) shows a detection event graph, where nodes represent detection events and edges indicate expected correlations due to data qubit errors (spacelike and spacetimelike) and measure qubit errors (timelike). Panel (b) depicts the ordering of measure qubits in the repetition code. Panel (c) presents a symmetric matrix of measured two-point correlations (p_ij) between detection events, with axes corresponding to possible locations of detection events in space and time. The upper triangle shows full-scale correlations, while the lower triangle highlights smaller correlations, revealing additional categories such as crosstalk and leakage errors. Panel (d) plots a time series of detection event fractions averaged over all measure qubits for each experimental run, showing sporadic events that significantly increase detection rates, attributed to high-energy particles like cosmic rays.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Exponential suppression of bit or phase errors with cyclic error correction - nature_images/Exponential suppression of bit or phase errors with cyclic error correction - nature-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000003_a11684d633162db9b9643d9918cceb68b50920a793db9c3e2bf6fa233b2f433a.png
image_title: 逻辑错误概率与量子比特数量的关系
description: 该图展示了在重复码中，逻辑错误概率随检测轮次和量子比特数量的变化。图a显示了不同量子比特数量（5、9、13、17、21个量子比特）的逻辑错误概率随检测轮次的变化趋势，其中还标注了平均量子比特退相干的影响。图b是半对数坐标下的数据展示，强调了逻辑错误概率随代码大小呈指数下降的趋势。图c则展示了每轮逻辑错误率（ε_L）与量子比特数量的关系，以及通过拟合得到的Λ因子，表明随着量子比特数量增加，逻辑错误率呈指数级抑制。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Exponential suppression of bit or phase errors with cyclic error correction - nature_images/Exponential suppression of bit or phase errors with cyclic error correction - nature-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000004_19c3a1136fdbf39479949c9b3b4b9f31fe233fe0f30b1c66afc2cbf512098160.png
image_title: Error Budgeting for Repetition and Surface Codes
description: This figure presents an analysis of error budgeting for repetition codes (both bit-flip and phase-flip) and surface codes. Panel (a) shows the depolarizing error probabilities for various quantum operations, including data qubit decoherence (DD), CZ gates, measurements (M), resets (R), Hadamard gates (H), and identity gates (I). Panel (b) illustrates the contributions to the inverse logical threshold factor (1/Λ) for different codes, highlighting the dominant sources of error such as the CZ gate and data qubit decoherence during measurement and reset. Panel (c) depicts a schematic of a distance-2 surface code with seven qubits, showing one weight-4 X stabilizer and two weight-2 Z stabilizers. Panel (d) plots the post-selected logical error probability over rounds for both experimental data and model simulations, demonstrating good agreement between the two.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Exponential suppression of bit or phase errors with cyclic error correction - nature_images/Exponential suppression of bit or phase errors with cyclic error correction - nature-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000005_21f6b56b742e469a3cd2df6c2c49e57a403fb1c45b3b3d213a5e765b738381aa.png
image_title: 量子纠错中错误指数级抑制
description: 图片展示了在量子纠错过程中，通过循环纠错机制对位错误或相位错误的指数级抑制效果。这反映了量子纠错技术在提高量子计算稳定性与可靠性方面的关键作用，特别是在面对噪声和误差时的有效性。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Experimental demonstration of memory-enhanced quantum communication_images/Experimental demonstration of memory-enhanced quantum communication-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000001_f6baff93a8cf25ee263f96a41a2571927e77ce7c14b3d70fcba377d869d2f140.png
image_title: Concept of Memory-Enhanced Quantum Communication
description: This image illustrates the concept of memory-enhanced quantum communication, comparing direct transmission and memory-assisted approaches. Part (a) shows a quantum communication protocol where Alice and Bob send qubits to Charlie, who performs a Bell state measurement (BSM) and announces the result. After revealing their basis choices, a sifted key is generated. Part (b) depicts the timing of photon arrivals at Charlie from Alice and Bob over a lossy channel. In the direct transmission approach, photons must arrive simultaneously for successful BSM, which is rare due to random arrival times. The memory-assisted approach uses a quantum memory to store one photon while waiting for the other, increasing the success rate of BSM within the memory coherence time T2, despite the overhead time TR associated with operating the memory.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Experimental demonstration of memory-enhanced quantum communication_images/Experimental demonstration of memory-enhanced quantum communication-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000002_be18c041acae40e226671db585a3d39a470afe7f98d9c32ed3f079b4d0a7c42e.png
image_title: 量子存储增强的异步贝尔态测量示意图
description: 该图片展示了使用量子存储器实现异步贝尔态测量（BSM）的实验装置和结果。图a显示了实验设置，包括来自A/B的光子输入、腔体反射、以及与自旋相关的检测器。图b描绘了腔体反射率随激光失谐的变化，图c展示了在30微秒内检测到的光子数量直方图，用于单次读出。图d说明了自旋初始化和光子脉冲的时间序列，图e给出了不同基下的自旋-光子态的概率分布，图f则展示了保真度随平均光子数的变化。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Experimental demonstration of memory-enhanced quantum communication_images/Experimental demonstration of memory-enhanced quantum communication-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000003_1ae60fc30d9b5b68033fc14a14a629bf9e44f7ec0982e0c51dfa6699e019e418.png
image_title: Asynchronous Bell State Measurement (BSM) Using Quantum Memory
description: This image illustrates the process of asynchronous Bell state measurement (BSM) using quantum memory. It includes multiple panels: Panel a shows an example sequence with N = 6 photonic qubits sent in a single memory time, where microwave π pulses are interleaved with incoming optical pulses. The photons have fixed amplitude and qubits are defined by the relative phases between subsequent pulses. Panel b provides a Bloch sphere representation of input photonic time-bin qubits used for characterization. Panel c characterizes the asynchronous BSM setup, showing the probability distribution of detected photon numbers during a 30-μs laser pulse. Panel d displays the correlations between input photons, demonstrating violations of the Bell-CHSH inequality, which confirms the device's capability for secure quantum communication based on Bell's theorem.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Experimental demonstration of memory-enhanced quantum communication_images/Experimental demonstration of memory-enhanced quantum communication-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000004_4ddc481cf5c6f92e7e7774797b9c7d332a6630c2eb0d348450a4259db62a5c43.png
image_title: Memory-Assisted Quantum Communication Performance
description: A log-log plot illustrating the key rate (in bits per channel use) versus effective channel transmission (p_{A→B} in dB). The red line represents the theoretical maximum for a loss-equivalent direct-transmission experiment. Green open circles show the experimentally measured sifted key rate, with the green line indicating the expected rate. Black filled circles represent distilled key rates using a memory device. Error bars indicate 68% confidence intervals (vertical) and standard deviation of systematic power fluctuations (horizontal). The plot demonstrates the performance improvement achieved by memory-assisted quantum communication compared to direct transmission.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Experimental demonstration of memory-enhanced quantum communication_images/Experimental demonstration of memory-enhanced quantum communication-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000005_f9ae69f8f3dee27709ec731b9ef123bf40fea950f8c15aaba58d77cfc2d9aa3c.png
image_title: 实验装置示意图
description: 该图片展示了量子通信实验的详细装置布局，包括信号生成、光纤网络、探测器和控制单元。图中包含多个部分：a) 控制流程图，显示了数字信号发生器（HSDIO）、光波形发生器（Opt AWG）、微波波形发生器（MW AWG）以及时间标签记录仪（TT）等组件的连接关系；b) 光纤网络结构，用于传输和收集光子，涉及偏振控制、耦合效率测量等元素；c) 光学场准备过程，通过声光调制器（AOMs）和相位/幅度调制器（ΦM 和 AM）定义光子量子比特。整体设计旨在实现基于硅空位中心的量子存储和通信实验。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Experimental demonstration of memory-enhanced quantum communication_images/Experimental demonstration of memory-enhanced quantum communication-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000006_2870c91bd0b798508bdce4d22a4e2fb3b6c86a98411c68c2af6f5d8ae483bf8c.png
image_title: Cavity Reflection Spectrum and SiV Linewidth Characterization
description: This image presents two panels showing the characterization of a cavity reflection spectrum and the linewidth of a silicon-vacancy (SiV) center. Panel (a) displays the cavity reflection spectrum far-detuned (blue) and on resonance (red) with the SiV center. The blue solid line is a fit to a Lorentzian, enabling extraction of the linewidth κ = 21.8 GHz. The red solid line is a fit to a model used to determine the single-photon Rabi frequency g = 8.38 ± 0.05 GHz, showing the onset of normal mode splitting. Panel (b) shows the measurement of the SiV linewidth far detuned (∆c = 248 GHz) from cavity resonance. The red solid line is a fit to a Lorentzian, enabling extraction of the natural linewidth γ = 0.123 GHz.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Experimental demonstration of memory-enhanced quantum communication_images/Experimental demonstration of memory-enhanced quantum communication-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000007_0e3abab76d2dbe5ad46088b6d53aa52188164c6728a46b6db4f4f9afc2d8a921.png
image_title: Microwave Characterization of Spin-Coherence Properties
description:
This image presents experimental data related to the microwave characterization of spin-coherence properties in a quantum system. It includes multiple panels (a-e) that detail various measurements and analyses:
- Panel (a): An optically detected magnetic resonance spectrum showing the qubit transition at approximately 12 GHz, split by coupling to a nearby 13C nucleus.
- Panel (b): Rabi oscillations read out via the population in the |↑⟩ state, indicating a π time (τ_R) of 30 ns.
- Panel (c): XY8-1 dynamical decoupling signal as a function of total time T, demonstrating coherence preservation over time.
- Panel (d): Additional data likely related to coherence or fidelity measurements over time.
- Panel (e): A plot showing fidelity values as a function of the number of pulses, highlighting the performance of the system under different conditions.
These results collectively provide insights into the coherence properties and operational capabilities of the quantum system under study.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Experimental demonstration of memory-enhanced quantum communication_images/Experimental demonstration of memory-enhanced quantum communication-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000008_d5a81a180181186b9125819649bec9df05bf72d08f5a5add1186bb636ff5b7b1.png
image_title: Time-Bin Qubit Measurement in Z and X Bases
description: This image illustrates the measurement of time-bin qubits in both Z and X bases. Panel (a) shows the sent qubits with a time separation of δt = 142 ns between two pulses, representing the early (|e⟩) and late (|l⟩) components. Panel (b) depicts the measured qubits, where the central peak corresponds to constructive interference of the early and late components, indicating a measurement in the |+x⟩ state of the X basis. The peaks on either side correspond to measurements in the Z basis, distinguishing between |e⟩ and |l⟩ states. This setup demonstrates the ability to perform quantum measurements using time-bin encoding.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Experimental demonstration of memory-enhanced quantum communication_images/Experimental demonstration of memory-enhanced quantum communication-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000009_802a68841de26654718c3f827c3bdfb28edf0ab4c96c328e25789a67c89da18c.png
image_title: 量子存储器增强的通信性能与信道损耗的关系
description: 该图展示了在不同信道损耗条件下，量子存储器增强的通信性能。图中包含三个子图：(a) 增强因子随信道损耗（以 dB 表示）的变化，其中 N = 124；(b) 误码率 (QBER) 随信道损耗的变化，同样 N = 124；(c) QBER 随平均光子数 (<n>_m) 的变化，其中 <n>_m ≈ 0.02。红色虚线表示理论极限或参考值，绿色阴影区域可能代表实验中的特定条件或阈值范围。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Generation of time-domain-multiplexed two-dimensional cluster state_images/Generation of time-domain-multiplexed two-dimensional cluster state-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000000_4ba6ea02fca5448a5f5aa49a8a66e83f475c9fa951826f204afe2298f097a7fb.png
image_title: MBQC 和二维簇态生成示意图
description:
该图展示了量子计算中的测量为基础的量子计算（MBQC）和二维簇态的生成过程。图中包含多个部分：
- **A 部分**：展示了一维簇态用于单输入量子计算的抽象示意图。
- **B 部分**：展示了使用二维簇态进行通用多输入量子计算的抽象示意图，其中每个彩色圆圈代表一个模式，每条链接表示量子纠缠。
- **C 部分**：详细描述了实验装置，包括光学参量振荡器（OPO）、光束分离器（BS）、光延迟线（ODL）等组件，以及时间间隔 Δt 和整数 N 的设置。
- **D 部分**：展示了生成的二维簇态的三维结构，呈现为一个圆柱形网格，其表面由排列成二维正方形晶格的站点（宏观节点）组成，时间模式（微观节点）以非平凡的方式连接。
- **E 部分**：进一步解释了二维簇态的时间模式索引 k、k-N 和 k+1 的细节，以及微观节点和宏观节点的布局。
整体上，该图说明了如何通过一系列光学元件和延迟线生成具有特定几何结构的二维簇态，并强调了其在量子计算中的应用。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Generation of time-domain-multiplexed two-dimensional cluster state_images/Generation of time-domain-multiplexed two-dimensional cluster state-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000001_b769497cd9e98e4cf7482825792f11f84f231b5603f1cd0342f9b3e333170394.png
image_title: 量子计算实验装置的简化示意图
description: 该图片展示了用于生成二维簇态的实验装置的简化示意图。图中包括光学参量振荡器（OPO）、光束分束器（BS）、光延迟线（ODL）等组件，以及时间间隔（D_t）和输入数量（N）。所有光束分束器均为50:50类型。此外，图中还展示了单模操作和双模操作的简化电路，分别对应于一个或两个输入模式的处理过程。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Generation of time-domain-multiplexed two-dimensional cluster state_images/Generation of time-domain-multiplexed two-dimensional cluster state-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000002_ee4c40033550144d4e40e26c7c40623723a6de03ef7f124e41809d91c6cd6d18.png
image_title: Quadrature Values and Correlations for Nullifiers
description: This image displays the quadrature values and correlations corresponding to different types of nullifiers for the first 50 temporal mode indices. Panels A and B show single-shot quadrature values (\hat{x}_{jk} and \hat{p}_{jk}) obtained from homodyne detectors labeled as A, B, C, and D. Panels C to F illustrate the correlations of quadrature values for four types of nullifiers: \hat{\delta}_k^{(x,1)}, \hat{\delta}_k^{(p,1)}, \hat{\delta}_k^{(x,2)}, and \hat{\delta}_k^{(p,2)}. The data points represent measurements across various temporal modes, with error bars indicating statistical uncertainties. Strong correlations between quadrature values from different temporal modes are observed, providing evidence of quantum entanglement in the generated states.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Generation of time-domain-multiplexed two-dimensional cluster state_images/Generation of time-domain-multiplexed two-dimensional cluster state-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000003_d36855d0053b185fdf89517cfa0fbf3812173bb992a0b9d959fb2bc332e07b60.png
image_title: Verification of Generated Cluster State for 24,960 Temporal Modes
description: This image shows the verification results of a generated cluster state across 24,960 temporal modes. The plot consists of four panels (A to D), each corresponding to a different type of nullifier: \hat{\delta}^{(x,1)}_k, \hat{\delta}^{(p,1)}_k, \hat{\delta}^{(x,2)}_k, and \hat{\delta}^{(p,2)}_k. The x-axis represents the temporal mode index k, while the y-axis shows the noise power in decibels (dB). Black points indicate measured variances of shot noise, used as reference levels. Blue points represent measured variances of nullifiers, and purple regions highlight areas where the variances of the nullifiers are below -4.5 dB compared to shot noise, indicating entanglement. The data demonstrates that all nullifiers remain below -4.5 dB up to k = 6240, confirming the quantum inseparability criteria for the cluster state.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Generation of time-domain-multiplexed two-dimensional cluster state_images/Generation of time-domain-multiplexed two-dimensional cluster state-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000004_43c3c1b24ed956557029c54b29e986e1e41ed8183b01d976c1c469f665b4fb06.png
image_title: Science期刊标志
description: 图片显示了红色的'Science'字样，这是《科学》（Science）杂志的标志性标识。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits_images/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000001_a14f6f66d51400e8d80494e68f2abda742bd3043a02ed1b5a00ac2e1122df597.png
image_title: Teleported CNOT Circuit Between Two Logical Qubits
description: This image illustrates the teleported CNOT gate circuit between two logical qubits, D1 and D2. The circuit involves entanglement between communication qubits (C1 and C2) to enable the teleportation of a quantum gate operation without direct interaction between the data qubits. Key components include the generation of entanglement in the communication qubits, measurement operations on the communication qubits, and conditional operations on the data qubits based on measurement outcomes. This setup demonstrates a modular architecture where logical qubits are encoded within higher-dimensional spaces for error correction, and the teleported gate is implemented deterministically using real-time adaptive control.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits_images/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000002_71c1b104fc3febe4933354b2114da77e4d49799df8f3ea8dfd9ace08b3d6e50f.png
image_title: Modular Quantum Architecture and Teleported CNOT Gate
description: This image illustrates the modular quantum architecture used for implementing a teleported CNOT gate between two logical qubits. The figure is divided into three parts: (a) shows an overview of the network, where modules are represented as nodes with data qubits (magenta) and communication qubits (cyan), connected by reconfigurable communication channels (purple lines). (b) provides a detailed view of each module, which contains one data qubit and one communication qubit, along with their respective components such as the cavity, transmon, and readout resonator. (c) depicts the circuit diagram for the teleported CNOT gate, showing the sequence of operations required to entangle the communication qubits and perform local operations within each module. This setup demonstrates the modular approach to quantum computing, enabling high-fidelity control over both data and communication qubits.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits_images/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000003_b3b98b724291987517f72bd761366675aa1e86f8d3d408d9c0e19868f0b648fe.png
image_title: 逻辑数据量子比特编码与CNOT真值表
description: 该图片展示了逻辑布洛赫球（Logical Bloch sphere）的表示，其中数据量子比特在二项式编码基中被逻辑编码。图片左侧显示了六个基本状态 {±Ẑ, ±X̂, ±Ŷ} 的Wigner函数，右侧则展示了通过执行远程传送的CNOT操作后提取的Wigner函数，验证了门的正确经典行为。Wigner函数不仅提供了逻辑量子比特状态的直观视觉表示，还完全指定了底层腔体状态，类似于对构成逻辑量子比特的物理量子比特进行完整状态层析的能力。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits_images/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000004_edf593f6c580183aa09d6c79b17de48e984a3b1c231486bafb8a1fcb3b2b881d.png
image_title: Teleported CNOT Truth Table
description: This image illustrates the truth table for a teleported CNOT gate operation. The left two columns show experimental Wigner functions for all four logical computational states as input states, while the right two columns display the extracted Wigner functions after performing the teleported CNOT operation. This demonstrates the correct classical behavior of the gate, confirming its functionality in transforming the input states into the expected output states.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits_images/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000005_60da4b578b061653c192c218845c3ae44a2f875124bca217198da2ef28cc3514.png
image_title: 逻辑数据量子比特编码与CNOT真值表
description: 该图展示了逻辑数据量子比特的编码以及通过 teleportation 实现的 CNOT 真值表。左侧两列显示了实验中四种逻辑计算态作为输入状态的 Wigner 函数，右侧两列则展示了执行 teleportation CNOT 操作后提取的 Wigner 函数，验证了门操作的正确经典行为。Wigner 函数是通过直接测量腔体的位移联合奇偶性来确定的，该参数由复数变量 β 参数化，反映了腔体状态。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits_images/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000007_7636dd241246a8facc8fdaca3bf28bde82af8628ab2401673800b2e0efb49275.png
image_title: 逻辑贝尔态的生成与验证
description: 该图片展示了通过量子关联生成逻辑贝尔态的过程及其验证。图a部分显示了在不同测量结果（m=0 和 m=1）下，目标量子比特（D2）的Wigner函数分布，分别对应于控制量子比特在逻辑Z基和X基下的测量结果。图b部分则展示了实验中提取的Pauli算符分量值与理想值的对比，证实了逻辑贝尔态的生成，尽管存在与理想值相比的对比度降低。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits_images/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000008_75b88a64917edd03606846c61ec0825d1bcf3230dd97aeb5da59035e2163c021.png
image_title: Measurement Outcome
description: This image illustrates the measurement outcomes of a quantum system, likely related to the demonstration of a deterministic teleported CNOT gate. The figure shows different measurement results (e.g., {00, 01, 10, 11}) and their corresponding effects on the resulting state fidelity. It highlights how feedforward operations influence the output states, emphasizing the importance of classical communication and feedback in achieving deterministic quantum operations.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits_images/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000009_c1761ff44a8529dce29b3a3a25a1996dc3ce6d148c055802b707e43c09f11639.png
image_title: Bell State Fidelity with and without Feedforward Operations
description: This image illustrates the fidelity of the resulting quantum state to each of the four Bell states, comparing the outcomes with and without feedforward operations. The x-axis represents the Bell states (|Φ⁺⟩, |Φ⁻⟩, |Ψ⁺⟩, |Ψ⁻⟩), while the y-axis shows the fidelity to these Bell states. The measurement outcomes are categorized as {00, 01, 10, 11} and 'All'. The bars indicate the experimental results (purple) and ideal values (gray). Without feedforward operations, different measurement outcomes lead to varying Bell states, resulting in a mixed state when all outcomes are compiled ('All'). With feedforward operations applied, the fidelity to the target Bell state is significantly improved across all measurement outcomes, demonstrating the effectiveness of feedforward in achieving deterministic teleportation.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits_images/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000010_7e7a20fcdb4c542467f6dd37c4090c8b4846d3386669900394e2958c40fce864.png
image_title: Bell 状态的保真度矩阵
description: 该图展示了 Bell 状态在 Pauli 基础下的保真度矩阵，其中每个单元格表示两个量子比特状态之间的相关性。红色和蓝色分别代表正负值，数值范围从 -1.0 到 1.0，反映了不同 Pauli 操作（如 II、IX、IY 等）下状态的成分值。图中理想状态（Ideal）与实验结果的对比表明了 Bell 状态的生成质量，以及逻辑量子比特之间存在的强两体关联。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits_images/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000011_f64d59b4de5a36ea03c7219146316ef633ab7d16399f0796cfe364b337860369.png
image_title: Bell State Reconstruction via Pauli Basis Tomography
description: This image depicts the results of quantum state tomography performed on a two-qubit system, reconstructed in the Pauli basis. The grid shows the measured expectation values for various Pauli operators (e.g., II, IX, XY, ZZ), with colors indicating the magnitude of each value. The 'Experiment' label suggests that these are experimental measurements used to reconstruct the density matrix of the Bell state generated between two logical qubits. The reconstruction reveals dominant two-qubit correlations and near-zero single-qubit correlations, confirming the generation of an entangled state.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits_images/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000013_64ce0f0648503cf4461fed00839eaef9147a6f9643db65bff9dd682ade01e280.png
image_title: 确定性量子门的远程传输
description: 该图片展示了两个逻辑量子比特之间进行的确定性量子门的远程传输过程。这可能涉及量子态的精确操控和量子信息的长距离传输，体现了量子计算和量子通信领域的前沿技术。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits_images/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000016_ffad95b6bffe70f7d8de45c893f810f1b00585bdb7a9b9ec76685a07fa77b685.png
image_title: 物理设备的概述
description: 这张图片展示了用于量子计算实验的物理设备的组装。设备主体由高纯度（99.99%）铝制成，包含四个同轴λ/4三维腔体，其中三个被使用。图中用紫色和粉色轮廓分别标记了作为数据量子比特和总线的腔体。此外，图片还显示了固定每个蓝宝石芯片的两个夹具，其中一个夹具以蓝色突出显示。可见的连接器是每个腔体的输入端口，而传输子系统和读出谐振器的输入和输出端口位于设备的底部。

image_title: Sapphire Chip Cavities in Quantum Device
description: A close-up view of sapphire chip cavities within a quantum device. The image highlights two circular cavities, each outlined in magenta and purple, respectively. These cavities are part of the high-purity aluminum device assembly used for quantum experiments. The visible connectors indicate input ports for the cavities, which are integral to the operation of the quantum system.

description: A close-up view of a sapphire chip clamp used in the quantum device assembly. The image highlights the mechanical structure anchoring the sapphire chip, with one clamp shown in detail. This component is part of the high-purity aluminum device that contains coaxial λ/4 three-dimensional cavities used for quantum operations.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits_images/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000020_192e6f7768e628fa13b57c3ca54aa60d631cd58d01e00e18d8b9b9ad74266532.png
image_title: Communication-qubit Bell state generation and characterization
description: This image illustrates the process of generating and characterizing a Bell state between two communication qubits. The top part shows the pulse sequence used to create the Bell pair, while the bottom part displays the experimentally measured Pauli vector components of the two qubits. The generated state is compared with the ideal Bell state (|00⟩ + |11⟩)/√2, with the ideal values denoted as hollow bars. This figure is crucial for demonstrating the fidelity and quality of the entangled state, which is essential for teleportation protocols.

image_title: Communication-qubit Bell state generation and characterization
description: This image illustrates the process of generating and characterizing a Bell state between two communication qubits. The top part shows the pulse sequence used to create the Bell pair, while the bottom part displays the experimentally measured Pauli vector components of the two qubits. The generated state is compared with the ideal Bell state (|01⟩ + |10⟩)/√2, highlighting the fidelity of the entangled state.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits_images/Deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between two logical qubits-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000022_16343204efa9ec2d6d1c80df0525c11c0b07b1d7d7664ffb378eaa4274cfa818.png
image_title: Communication Qubit Measurement Crosstalk Analysis
description: This image presents an analysis of measurement crosstalk between two communication qubits, labeled C1 and C2. The figure is divided into three parts: (a) shows the pulse sequence used in the Rabi experiment to extract measurement crosstalk, where both qubits are initialized in the ground state and rotated by independent X rotations with angles θ1 and θ2. Parts (b) and (c) display experimental results for excitation probabilities as a function of rotation angles. In part (b), C2 is kept in the ground state while performing a Rabi experiment on C1, showing high-contrast oscillations for C1 (green circles) and minimal crosstalk for C2 (orange squares). Part (c) mirrors this setup but focuses on C2, demonstrating similar behavior. The results indicate that the measurements on each qubit are largely independent, supporting the fidelity of the reset protocol.

image_title: Communication-qubit Bell state pulse sequence
description: This image depicts the pulse sequence used to generate a Bell state between two communication qubits. The sequence involves specific operations and timings to entangle the qubits, as part of the experimental setup for deterministic teleportation of a quantum gate between logical qubits. The diagram illustrates the steps required to prepare the Bell state, which is crucial for the subsequent implementation of the teleported CNOT gate protocol.

image_title: 量子门的确定性远程传输电路图
description: 该图片展示了实现两个逻辑量子比特之间确定性远程传输CNOT门的详细电路图和脉冲序列。上半部分是电路图，包括数据量子比特（D1、D2）、通信量子比特（C1、C2）以及它们之间的相互作用模块，如Bell对生成、数据量子比特编码和解码等。下半部分是时间轴上的脉冲序列，详细说明了各个操作步骤的时间点和持续时间，包括通信量子比特旋转、Bell态生成、局部操作、通信量子比特测量与重置、反馈操作、优化控制脉冲以及最终的量子态层析测量。

image_title: Communication-qubit Bell state pulse sequence
description: This image depicts the pulse sequence used to generate a communication-qubit Bell pair. The sequence involves steps to create an entangled state between two qubits, followed by quantum state tomography to assess the quality of the entangled state. The diagram illustrates the temporal ordering and types of pulses applied to achieve the desired Bell state.

image_title: 量子门的确定性隐形传态电路图
description: 该图片展示了一个详细的量子电路图，用于实现两个逻辑量子比特之间的确定性隐形传态。电路中包含多个量子操作，如 π/2 和 π 脉冲（X_{π/2} 和 X_{π}），以及 U_1 和 U_2 等量子门操作。此外，电路还涉及了数据量子比特 D1 和 D2、通信量子比特 C1 和 C2，以及一个公共总线（bus）。此电路设计用于演示隐形传态过程中的关键步骤，包括量子信息的编码、贝尔态的生成和测量，以及基于测量结果的反馈操作。

image_title: Communication-Qubit Bell Pair Characterization
description: This image shows the experimentally measured Pauli vector components of two communication qubits, which are part of a Bell pair. The expectation values for various Pauli operators (II, IX, IY, IZ, XI, XX, XY, XZ, YI, YX, YY, YZ, ZI, ZX, ZY, ZZ) are plotted on the y-axis against the corresponding Pauli operators on the x-axis. The generated state is shown to be close to the ideal Bell state (∣00⟩ + ∣11⟩)/√2, with the ideal values denoted as hollow bars. This figure helps characterize the quality and fidelity of the entangled Bell state between the two communication qubits.

image_title: Communication-Qubit Measurement Results
description: This image presents experimental results related to the measurement of communication qubits in a quantum system. Part (a) shows a circuit diagram illustrating the sequence of operations applied to two communication qubits, C1 and C2, including rotations and measurements. Part (c) displays a bar chart comparing the expectation values of Pauli operators for different measurement outcomes. The chart highlights the fidelity of the measurement process across various Pauli operators, demonstrating high-fidelity results for certain operators when all measurement outcomes are combined.

image_title: Communication-qubit Bell state generation and characterization
