image_title: Sycamore Processor Layout
description: This image illustrates the layout of the Sycamore quantum processor, showing a rectangular array of 54 qubits (represented by grey squares). Each qubit is connected to its four nearest neighbors via adjustable couplers (represented by blue lines). One qubit is outlined, indicating it is inoperable. The design highlights the connectivity and structure of the processor, which is crucial for executing quantum computations with high fidelity.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Supremacy Using a Programmable Superconducting Processor - nature_images/Quantum Supremacy Using a Programmable Superconducting Processor - nature-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000001_f7d42752c766215f4d5e53b0f5e2766708638c40980e9f11944b1093f5da91e5.png
image_title: Sycamore量子处理器的实物照片
description: 这张图片展示了Sycamore量子处理器的实物，这是一个超导量子计算芯片。芯片被安装在一个金色的基板上，周围有精细的电路图案和连接线。芯片本身是一个矩形结构，表面光滑且具有一定的反光性，显示出其精密制造的特点。图片右下角有一个10毫米的比例尺，用于展示芯片的实际尺寸。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Supremacy Using a Programmable Superconducting Processor - nature_images/Quantum Supremacy Using a Programmable Superconducting Processor - nature-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000002_8364282b5b342fa402c7d51144455bb4db31772068263740964bd5d75bb4a174.png
image_title: 系统级Pauli和测量误差分布
description: 该图展示了在隔离操作和同时操作条件下，量子处理器中单量子比特、双量子比特以及读出操作的Pauli误差和测量误差的累积分布函数（ECDF）。图中不同颜色的线条分别代表不同的误差类型：黑色表示单量子比特Pauli误差（θ1），绿色表示双量子比特循环误差（θ2c），蓝色表示双量子比特误差（θ2），橙色表示读出误差（θr）。虚线表示隔离操作条件下的误差分布，实线表示同时操作条件下的误差分布。图中还标注了每种误差类型的中位数位置，位于垂直轴的0.50处，并提供了平均误差值。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Supremacy Using a Programmable Superconducting Processor - nature_images/Quantum Supremacy Using a Programmable Superconducting Processor - nature-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000003_10906568ef9bebe8655eb8993d77078d6dd3cf50283481aa29e27782e569c003.png
image_title: 量子处理器中的单量子比特和双量子比特Pauli错误分布
description: 该图展示了一个量子处理器中所有量子比特同时运行时的单量子比特（e1）和双量子比特（e2）Pauli错误的热力图。每个量子比特的位置在处理器布局中标注，颜色表示对应的错误率，其中蓝色代表较低的错误率，紫色和黄色代表较高的错误率。单量子比特错误用叉号标记，双量子比特错误用条形标记，直观地展示了不同位置量子比特的错误分布情况。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Supremacy Using a Programmable Superconducting Processor - nature_images/Quantum Supremacy Using a Programmable Superconducting Processor - nature-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000004_6a66387f2b105a327c35e776206c71378a5cce178bb34abb712c9f2d26f223ba.png
image_title: 量子电路实例与控制操作
description: 该图片展示了用于实验的量子电路实例，包括单量子比特门和双量子比特门的序列。图中显示了多个周期（Cycle），每个周期包含一层单量子比特门和一层双量子比特门。单量子比特门随机选择自 {X, Y, W} 集合，其中 W = (X + Y) / √2，且不重复连续应用。双量子比特门按照特定的排列模式选择，将每个量子比特依次与其四个最近邻量子比特耦合。此外，图中还提供了单量子比特门和双量子比特门的时间尺度，分别为 25 ns 和 12 ns，以及相关的控制信号示意图。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Supremacy Using a Programmable Superconducting Processor - nature_images/Quantum Supremacy Using a Programmable Superconducting Processor - nature-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000005_ad607b5446e0a00ed4937f98616ee7f2de08eef366bc6600307063b7dc443b4b.png
image_title: 量子霸权验证与经典计算成本对比
description: 该图展示了在不同量子电路规模和深度下，量子处理器的交叉熵基准测试保真度（F_XEB）与经典计算模拟的成本对比。图a部分显示了可经典验证的电路中，全电路、简化电路和补丁电路的保真度随量子比特数的变化，以及预测值与测量值的吻合情况。图b部分则聚焦于量子霸权区域，展示了53个量子比特的电路在不同循环次数下的保真度，以及相应的经典计算所需时间（从几小时到千年不等）。这表明量子处理器在处理复杂电路时具有显著优势，超越了当前经典计算机的能力。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000000_4fbd45ed51945ddb92a744260cc21aee224601e381a653b3beb64957f14a7bf4.png
image_title: 混合态纠缠与量子纠错示意图
description: 该图展示了混合态纠缠的数学表示和相关过程。图中包含两个子系统 A 和 B，分别位于 Hilbert 空间 \mathcal{H}_A 和 \mathcal{H}_B 中。时间轴上显示了从初始状态 I 到混合态 M 的演化过程，其中 N_A 和 N_B 分别代表子系统 A 和 B 的维度。此外，图中标注了 EPP（Entanglement Purification Protocol）的过程，表明通过某种操作可以将混合态转化为更纯净的纠缠态。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000001_0371876830b43d56886de51334b423be7405a65311af3ec8387b52e966b1bf8c.png
image_title: Two-Way Entanglement Purification Protocol (2-EPP)
description: This diagram illustrates the process of a two-way entanglement purification protocol (2-EPP). Alice and Bob start with a bipartite mixed state, subject it to local unitary transformations (U1 and U2), perform measurements (M), and exchange measurement results via classical communication. This iterative process aims to purify the state into a maximally entangled state (*), indicated by stars at the end of the protocol. The dashed lines represent noise (NA and NB) in the quantum channels, while the double arrows signify classical communication between Alice and Bob.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000002_fde88cadb7d087a73dfd674b004de42b6944cc24590c65e409b06790e93be0ec.png
image_title: One-Way Entanglement Purification Protocol (1-EPP)
description: This diagram illustrates the one-way entanglement purification protocol (1-EPP), where Alice and Bob share a bipartite mixed state. The process involves a single stage of unitary transformation (U1 for Alice and U2 for Bob) followed by measurements (M). Alice then sends her classical measurement result to Bob, who uses it along with his own measurement result to perform a final unitary transformation (U3). This unidirectional communication allows the final maximally-entangled state (*) to be separated both in space and time.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000003_581130393e54eb175673cdb10079ed0c723de460173441084c7e5aac00f1dc51.png
image_title: 量子隐形传态与时间分离的EPR对
description: 该图展示了利用一维纠缠纯化协议（1-EPP）创建的时间分离的EPR对，以及通过量子隐形传态将任意量子态|ξ⟩精确传输的过程。图中，Alice执行Bell测量M4，而Bob随后执行单位变换U4，以完成量子态的精确复现，即使在存在噪声的情况下也能实现。这体现了量子纠错码（QECC）的核心效果，即保护量子信息免受环境噪声的影响。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000005_c94f0426f37865e006589fea155c7c995d0837ca9a9628d15c15cf94ed7a8787.png
image_title: Unilateral π Rotations on Bell States
description: This image illustrates the effect of unilateral π rotations (corresponding to Pauli matrices σ_x, σ_y, and σ_z) on the four Bell states: Ψ-, Φ-, Φ+, and Ψ+. Each row shows how a specific unilateral rotation transforms the source Bell state into another Bell state. The table demonstrates that these operations map one Bell state onto another, providing a fundamental tool for manipulating entangled states in quantum information processing.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000006_b830daa70906e0403726fffeebeaa53a9efb303c9e789c6faba432fe79159080.png
image_title: BXOR 操作示意图
description: 该图展示了 BXOR（量子 XOR 或受控非操作）操作的原理。图中包含两个 Bell 状态，一个作为源（source），另一个作为目标（target）。源状态用实心点表示，目标状态用叉号圆圈表示。具体地，图中显示了一个 Ψ- 状态作为源，而 Φ+ 状态作为目标。根据上下文中的 Table 1，当执行 BXOR 操作后，源状态保持不变，而目标状态将变为 Ψ+。此图用于说明如何通过局部操作实现 Bell 状态之间的映射，是量子纠错和纯化协议中的关键步骤。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000007_f2e98703a4cea313204126c5389862076839003ba8fe1bf937b05297c1dd9666.png
image_title: Werner State Fidelity Improvement via Recurrence Protocol
description: This graph illustrates the effect of one step of purification on the fidelity of Werner states using the recurrence protocol. The x-axis represents the initial fidelity (F) of the Werner state, while the y-axis shows both the final fidelity (F') of the 'passed' pairs after one iteration and the fraction of pairs remaining after one iteration (p_pass / 2). The curve for F' demonstrates how the fidelity improves with each iteration, while the curve for p_pass / 2 indicates the proportion of pairs that survive the purification process.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000008_8456d483afa62e3b3e5a9a3be0d4cde6770d06efe2352d27b981c65ef1040cb2.png
image_title: 不同方法的纠缠度量与保真度的关系
description: 该图展示了 Werner 状态的纠缠度量（E）以及几种不同协议的产率（D_R、D_M、D_H、D_CS）与初始保真度 F 的关系。横轴表示初始保真度 F，纵轴表示相应的度量值。曲线分别代表：E 是纠缠形成熵；D_R 是使用复发方法和后续哈希方法的产率；D_M 是修改后的复发方法（由 C. Macchiavello 提出）结合哈希方法的产率；D_H 是单独使用单向哈希和繁殖协议的产率；D_CS 是 Calderbank-Shor-Steane 量子纠错码的速率。图中显示了不同方法在不同保真度下的表现，特别是在高保真度区域的比较。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000009_5533b2f0c561773755b26b99a73e3e4de417d334cbcf90b1589ca6e39d6ef1c3.png
image_title: 不同协议的纠缠度量与保真度的关系
description: 该图展示了 Werner 状态的纠缠度量（如 E、D_R、D_M、D_H 和 D_CS）与保真度 F 的关系。横轴表示保真度 F，纵轴表示 Log(F-0.5)。图中曲线分别代表了不同的纠缠度量和协议：E 表示纠缠形成度量，D_R 表示复发方法的产率，D_M 表示修改后的复发方法的产率，D_H 表示单向哈希和繁殖协议的产率，D_CS 表示 Calderbank-Shor-Steane 量子纠错码的速率。随着保真度 F 的增加，这些度量值的变化趋势被清晰地展示出来，反映了不同协议在提高纠缠纯度方面的表现。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000010_84f0954f599b24c609ae5d31d472431ea8fbe42ebf66fba2a95ed099e33e9c1d.png
image_title: 量子态纯化中的局部操作与BXOR步骤
description: 该图展示了量子态纯化过程中，利用局部操作和BXOR（Bell XOR）操作来收集特定子集的奇偶校验。图中显示了不同索引字符串s_k（如00、11、01、10）对应的处理步骤，包括对贝尔态的相位和幅度比特进行操作，以及如何将这些比特的奇偶校验收集到目标比特中。具体地，图中展示了如何通过B_x、σ_x和B_y等操作，将特定子集的奇偶校验信息编码到目标比特的幅度比特中，同时避免了‘反作用’对输入字符串x的影响。此过程是量子态纯化协议（如哈希或繁殖协议）中的关键步骤，用于减少候选状态的数量并提高纯化效率。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000011_bef2912b17d243c6f6c6adbcaa10b45badc7db00915332ba6d32ea89e0d83ae8.png
image_title: 量子纠错中的一步纯化协议
description: 该图展示了量子纠错中的一种纯化协议步骤，具体为一步纯化协议（EPP11）。图中包含多个量子操作，如B_x、σ_x和B_y等，以及一个目标态（target）。通过这些操作，输入的量子态x经过一系列变换后输出为x'，并最终计算出s·x的值。此过程涉及量子态的旋转和测量，用于提取特定子集的奇偶性，以实现量子态的纯化。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000012_920875edb96bf3dde8e867e595b1ec48e688e2c5aec7e04653e813264ee51093.png
image_title: 对称的量子纠缠情况
description: 该图展示了Alice、Bob和Charlie之间的对称量子纠缠情况。图中，Alice与Bob和Charlie分别共享多个量子态，其中双箭头表示最大纠缠对（EPR对），而空心圆圈表示垃圾状态。这种对称性表明，从Alice的角度来看，每个粒子都像是一个完全混合的状态，这使得她无法区分哪些粒子是与Bob或Charlie共享的良好EPR对，从而证明了一种特定的量子态（如Werner态）无法通过一维协议进行纯化。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000013_f0074d0174284f0e32301e2d5d7f98f0f2cc016fc6d807346d864e63bd7cd760.png
image_title: 量子纠错码（QECC）的通用一维结构
description: 该图展示了一个通用的一维量子纠错码（QECC）的结构，包括编码变换 U_e 和解码变换 U_d。未知量子态 |ξ⟩ 首先通过编码变换 U_e 转换为编码态 |ζ_r⟩，然后通过一个嘈杂的量子信道 χ 进行传输，最终通过解码变换 U_d 恢复为原始态 |ξ⟩。此外，图中还包含一个从 Alice 到 Bob 的单向经典侧信道，用于辅助量子信息的可靠传输。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000014_2b088a2b63c12c0cfb496c69e1255d8817d1161f39c26edec70c79ebcd0a923f.png
image_title: 1-EPP 转换为 QECC 的示意图
description: 该图展示了如何通过一个一维纯化协议 (1-EPP) 来实现量子纠错码 (QECC)。图中，Alice 和 Bob 通过量子信道 χ(M) 进行通信。Alice 首先准备了最大纠缠态 Φ+ 的一半，并将其通过信道 χ 发送给 Bob。然后，Alice 和 Bob 执行 1-EPP 协议，生成 nD1 个完美纠缠态 (*)。这些纠缠态随后被用于安全地将未知量子态 |ξ⟩ 从 Alice 传送到 Bob，从而完成了一个 QECC。图中标注了关键步骤，包括 Alice 的编码操作 Ue、Bob 的解码操作 Ud，以及中间的量子信道 χ(M)。此外，图中还显示了 Alice 和 Bob 在协议中的具体操作和测量过程。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000015_4618676fc02c10bdc8590b42c7a94b4701adc59e75fe90273c42af74ce70ecf3.png
image_title: 1-EPP 转换为 QECC 的示意图
description: 该图展示了如何将一个一维纯化协议 (1-EPP) 转换为量子纠错码 (QECC)。图中，Alice 和 Bob 通过量子信道 χ 连接。Alice 首先生成最大纠缠态 Φ+，并将其中一半（B 部分）通过信道 χ 发送给 Bob，形成混合状态 M(χ)。随后，Alice 和 Bob 执行 1-EPP 协议，最终获得 nD1 个完美纠缠态 (*)。这些纠缠态被用于安全地将未知量子态 |ξ⟩ 通过量子隐形传态传输给 Bob，从而完成了一个 QECC。图中标注了 Alice 和 Bob 的操作 U_A 和 U_B，以及测量结果 m 的传递过程。此外，还显示了可能使用的辅助量子比特 a。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000016_b5f7facb01eabfaa6822e572df82abd5d86b85c3d69776ea662068a0711dd9e6.png
image_title: 量子纠错码（QECC）的简化协议示意图
description:
该图展示了量子纠错码（Quantum Error Correcting Code, QECC）的一个简化协议流程。图中包含以下关键元素：
1. 输入态 |ξ⟩ 和辅助态 |0⟩。
2. 单位ary操作 U₁，用于对输入态进行预处理。
3. 噪声通道 N_B，模拟量子态在传输过程中受到的噪声影响。
4. 单位ary操作 U₂，用于进一步处理受噪声影响的量子态。
5. 测量过程 m，提取经典信息以辅助纠错。
6. 单位ary操作 U₃，用于最终恢复量子态。
7. 输出态 |ξ⟩，表示经过纠错后的量子态。
整个流程旨在通过一系列量子操作和测量，纠正量子态在传输过程中受到的噪声，最终实现量子态的精确恢复。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000017_6b4bad6a9a796b5463c052dc73917c3534060e9e43a2fe4d469050c44d9f1827.png
image_title: 量子纠错协议中的1-EPP示意图
description:
该图展示了量子纠错协议中一个特定的1-EPP（Entanglement Purification Protocol）过程。图中包括两个主要部分：Alice和Bob的操作路径，以及它们之间的相互作用。具体元素包括：
- Alice和Bob分别通过路径A和B进行操作。
- NA和NB表示噪声通道，模拟量子态在传输过程中受到的干扰。
- U1和U2是Alice和Bob各自执行的单位ary变换。
- L_u表示线性布尔函数，用于映射输入状态x^(i)到中间状态w^(i)。
- v^(i)=x⊕y表示测量结果，其中x和y分别来自Alice和Bob的测量。
- U3是最终的旋转操作，用于恢复量子态。
此图详细说明了量子纠错协议中如何通过一系列操作和测量来净化量子态，确保最终状态达到最大纠缠。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000018_813d34fbc091fa5e316538924a4ae4272b1e65ba90e5156f3d05ae80b9705731.png
image_title: 量子纠错电路图
description: 该图片展示了一个量子纠错电路的逻辑结构，用于保护一个量子比特免受单比特错误的影响。电路中包含多个量子门操作，包括双边 XOR（异或）门、双边 Ry 旋转门和单边 σz 旋转门。这些门的操作分别标记为 'Source'（源）、'Target'（目标）、'Bilateral Ry Rotation' 和 'Unilateral σz Rotation'。电路设计旨在通过特定的量子操作序列实现对量子信息的保护，防止在传输或存储过程中出现错误。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000019_639296db62e264fd3e56b15a42807ed1bc951147425066e50f7c246d0c78f318.png
image_title: Bell State Transformation Table
description: This table illustrates the transformation of Bell states under bilateral rotations (I, B_x, B_y, B_z). Each row corresponds to a specific rotation operation applied to the four Bell states (Ψ⁻, Φ⁻, Φ⁺, Ψ⁺), showing how phases are introduced or altered. The identity operation (I) leaves all Bell states unchanged, while B_x, B_y, and B_z introduce phase factors (i) to certain states, demonstrating their effect on the phase structure of the Bell basis.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction_images/Mixed State Entanglement and Quantum Error Correction-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000020_c2c41dc62241b287841ddb7e81c2fc078809b045fcab8a84b7bd4c704768a25d.png
image_title: Twirling and Noise Channel Diagram
description: This diagram illustrates the process of twirling (T) applied to a quantum state |ξ⟩, followed by an initial rotation R^T and a noise channel N_B. The state then undergoes a final rotation R before being processed through unitary operations U_1, U_2, and U_3. The dashed box highlights the twirling and noise channel section, emphasizing how twirling simplifies the error model to Werner-type errors. This setup is relevant for understanding error correction protocols in quantum information theory.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Power of data in quantum machine learning_images/Power of data in quantum machine learning-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000000_b2140bd1723ab9105865aa5f41829e9400b774b45c73dd28198d06e7d3fdef2d.png
image_title: Complexity Classes and Quantum Advantage
description: The image illustrates the relationship between complexity classes in the context of quantum and classical machine learning. It shows three overlapping regions: 'Quantum Computation (BQP)', 'Classical Algorithm (BPP)', and 'Classical ML Algorithm w/ data'. The diagram highlights how classical algorithms with data can solve problems beyond classical computation (BPP), but quantum computation (BQP) still offers potential for solving problems that classical ML algorithms with data cannot efficiently address. This visual aids in understanding the separation and overlap between these computational paradigms, particularly in the context of quantum advantage.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Power of data in quantum machine learning_images/Power of data in quantum machine learning-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000002_0205432ea1ada3ab01b3987674af159ddd47f49154479d4502d415061ef992b0.png
image_title: 数据在量子机器学习中的力量：经典与量子核方法的对比
description: 该图展示了经典机器学习和量子核方法在处理数据时的几何差异。左侧部分表示经典机器学习空间，其中点 A、B、C、D、E、F、G、H 表示训练样本，使用橙色和红色箭头表示它们之间的几何距离 g。右侧部分表示通过嵌入到量子希尔伯特空间后的数据分布，展示了更高的维度（d-dim. training set space），其中 d 小于或等于训练集大小 N。最后，通过投影回到经典空间，说明了量子核方法如何利用高维空间的优势来改善预测性能。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Power of data in quantum machine learning_images/Power of data in quantum machine learning-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000003_30f53182990c08f55754a94157354db3bbfe5a2f1370eabcec03f929019c13b2.png
image_title: 维度、几何差异与预测性能的关系
description: 该图展示了系统大小（n）与维度（d）、几何差异（g）以及预测误差之间的关系。图分为两部分：(a) 部分显示了不同嵌入方法（E1、E2、E3）下，量子核（Q）和投影量子核（PQ）的维度和几何差异随系统大小的变化趋势。(b) 部分则比较了量子核方法（Q）、投影量子核方法（PQ）以及最佳经典机器学习模型在不同数据集（Q、C）上的回归和分类任务中的预测误差。随着维度 d 的增大，几何差异 g 变小，表明经典机器学习模型在预测性能上具有竞争力或优于量子机器学习模型。当几何差异 g 较大时，存在改进经典机器学习模型的可能性，例如，投影量子核在某些数据集上优于最佳经典模型。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Power of data in quantum machine learning_images/Power of data in quantum machine learning-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000004_cdae7756e1be6665d3526b2d571ce82f295275859ac860e40e7b32bd464aa425.png
image_title: 量子机器学习中数据的力量：预测准确率与系统规模的关系
description: 该图展示了在不同几何差异（g）条件下，经典机器学习模型和投影量子核方法的预测准确率随系统规模（n）的变化。图分为三部分，分别对应 g 小、中、大三种情况（PQ (E1): g - small, PQ (E2): g - moderate, PQ (E3): g - large）。对于每种情况，比较了两种训练数据量（N=100 和 N=600）下的最佳经典机器学习模型、投影量子核方法以及原始量子核方法的性能。随着系统规模的增加，经典模型和量子核方法的性能表现出不同的趋势，特别是在 g 较大的情况下，投影量子核方法显示出显著的优势，而经典模型和原始量子核方法的性能则下降明显。随机猜测的基准线也一并展示，用于对比各方法的性能。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Power of data in quantum machine learning_images/Power of data in quantum machine learning-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000005_53df846f3f56f3079064572bfeaf342543f5e883a0d823ff4ee19d6d099db3ed.png
image_title: 复杂度类与数据可用性的关系
description: 该图展示了在经典机器学习算法中，随着问题规模的增加，训练数据和建议（advice）对复杂度类的影响。左侧部分显示了经典机器学习算法（BPP/samp）如何利用训练数据集（T_n）来处理不同规模的问题，右侧部分则通过维恩图展示了量子计算（BQP）、经典算法（BPP）、以及P/poly等复杂度类之间的关系。图中强调了BPP/samp作为BPP的一个扩展，能够利用数据进行更高效的计算，并且BPP/samp被包含在P/poly中，表明数据的引入可以显著增强算法的能力。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Power of data in quantum machine learning_images/Power of data in quantum machine learning-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000006_284a4dea86d5c15cfd5f44622752f4915e839a57b119b275adeec34cfceda670.png
image_title: Quantum vs Classical ML Prediction Accuracy on Engineered Datasets
description: This image compares the prediction accuracy of classical machine learning models and quantum kernel methods (both original and projected) across different system sizes (n). The dataset is engineered to highlight the performance differences between classical and quantum approaches. The figure includes three subplots, each corresponding to a different embedding (E1, E2, and E3), with small geometric differences (g - small). The x-axis represents the system size (n), while the y-axis shows the prediction accuracy. The legend distinguishes between the best-performing classical ML models and various quantum kernel methods for two training set sizes (N=100 and N=600). A horizontal dashed line labeled 'Random guessing' serves as a baseline for comparison.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Power of data in quantum machine learning_images/Power of data in quantum machine learning-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000007_6f9b701650cf98089bf0200657bc87f93e1b5d9ecefd0ecc69346ec884332281.png
image_title: 不同训练数据量下的预测误差比较
description: 该图展示了在不同维度（n=10、n=11、n=12）下，随着训练数据量的变化，量子核方法（Q. kernel）、最佳经典机器学习模型（Best C. ML）和投影量子核方法（Proj. Q. kernel）的回归预测误差。图中显示了三种方法在不同训练数据量下的预测误差趋势，其中最佳经典机器学习模型的误差曲线通常较低，而量子核方法和投影量子核方法的误差曲线则相对较高。此外，图中还提供了误差范围的阴影区域，表示误差的不确定性。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Power of data in quantum machine learning_images/Power of data in quantum machine learning-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000008_c1be05861501d35e8c5769a2d0f15a6834778b3a06ceff51337a40618308b0ed.png
image_title: Prediction Error Bound vs System Size
description: This figure illustrates the prediction error bound for classical kernel methods as a function of system size (n). The plot shows multiple curves representing different classical machine learning models, including Gaussian SVM, linear SVM, Adaboost, random forest, neural networks, and gradient boosting. The x-axis represents the system size (n), while the y-axis represents the prediction error bound. The trend indicates that as the system size increases, the prediction error bound generally decreases or stabilizes, suggesting improved performance with larger systems. The shaded regions around the curves likely represent confidence intervals or variability in the bounds.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Power of data in quantum machine learning_images/Power of data in quantum machine learning-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000009_b96427d672a1de064001e471c98741a8294883aac60618ec9d19fb3f76d7e8dc.png
image_title: 不同系统规模下的预测误差比较
description: 该图展示了在不同量子数据集（Q, E1、Q, E2、Q, E3）上，随着系统规模（n）的增加，预测误差的变化趋势。横轴表示系统规模，纵轴表示预测误差。图中使用了三种颜色分别代表不同的数据集：蓝色代表 Q, E1 数据集，橙色代表 Q, E2 数据集，红色代表 Q, E3 数据集。每种数据集的预测误差曲线显示了其随系统规模变化的趋势，同时配有阴影区域表示误差范围。从图中可以看出，不同数据集在不同系统规模下的预测误差表现各异，其中 Q, E1 数据集的预测误差显著低于其他两个数据集，而 Q, E3 数据集的预测误差相对较高且波动较大。

image_title: 量子计算中的光子操作
description: 该图展示了光子在量子计算中的关键操作和结构。a 部分显示了两个光子进入一个 50:50 的分束器（BS），并发生量子干涉，用于实现非确定性相互作用。b 部分表示光子的振幅在分束器中传输和反射时的干涉过程。c 部分是波导中光子的强度分布图，展示了光子在波导中的传播特性。d 部分描绘了一个硅基芯片上的二氧化硅波导结构，包括金属层、二氧化硅层和硅芯片层，尺寸标注清晰，展示了微纳尺度的集成光学器件。e 部分是一个干涉仪结构，包含可控相位移，用于单量子比特操作和多光子纠缠态的操控。

image_title: 线性四极离子阱示意图
description: 该图片展示了线性四极离子阱的结构及其工作原理。上半部分是离子阱的三维模型，其中包含一个线性四极阱（Paul trap），用于捕获和控制多个钙离子（40Ca+）。红色箭头表示激光冷却过程，通过激光束将离子冷却至阱的中心位置。下半部分显示了被捕获离子的CCD成像结果，图像中可以看到多个离子形成的线性排列，相邻离子之间的间距约为8微米。整个系统利用电场将离子限制在三维谐振势阱中，形成稳定的原子晶体结构，适用于量子计算和量子信息处理。

image_title: Optical Lattice with Cold Atoms
description: The image illustrates an optical lattice, a structured potential created by crossed laser beams, used to trap and manipulate cold atoms for quantum information processing. The left panel shows a 3D representation of the optical lattice with red and yellow spheres representing trapped atoms in different energy states or species. The right panel depicts a real experimental observation of such a lattice, showing a grid-like pattern of atomic positions. This setup is crucial for initializing, interacting, and measuring atomic qubits in quantum computing applications.

image_title: 量子计算中的离子阱多路复用与光子纠缠示意图
description: 该图展示了量子计算中利用离子阱进行多路复用和通过光子实现远程原子纠缠的原理。图a部分说明了如何通过在小集合的离子上执行量子门操作，然后物理地将这些离子转移到不同的捕获区域来传播纠缠态。图b部分展示了可能需要更先进的陷阱结构，这些结构可能会在芯片结构上制造（由D. J. Wineland, NIST提供）。图c部分描绘了通过发射、干涉和检测光子来实现远程原子纠缠的过程，使用了分束器（BS）和光电倍增管（PMT）作为关键组件。

image_title: 光学晶格中的原子分布
description: 图片展示了光学晶格中冷原子的分布情况。左侧为三维示意图，显示了由激光束形成的周期性势阱（蓝色曲面），其中红色和黄色球体代表不同状态的原子，均匀分布在势阱中。右侧为实验观测图像，展示了实际光学晶格中冷原子的排列，呈现出规则的点阵结构，反映了原子在势阱中的有序分布。

image_title: 量子计算中的光子纠缠与网络化
description: 该图展示了通过光子相互作用实现离子阱量子比特扩展的方法。图中包括了光子路径、分束器（BS）、光电倍增管（PMT）以及光纤连接，用于描述如何利用光子在远程距离上实现原子的纠缠。这种方法的优势在于光子可以轻松跨越长距离，而无需依赖声子（如库仑耦合量子门中使用的）。此外，图中还展示了如何通过光子与单个原子离子的纠缠，实现宏观距离上的离子纠缠，这类似于概率线性光学量子计算方案，但结合了稳定的量子比特存储器，从而能够通过量子中继电路高效扩展到大距离通信，并可扩展到大量量子比特以进行分布式概率量子计算。

image_title: 量子点与氮空位中心的结构示意图
description: 该图片展示了三种不同类型的量子系统：(a) 电荷感应量子点，其中电子被电场限制在二维电子气（2DEG）中；(b) 自组装量子点的显微图像，显示了InGaAs和GaAs材料界面处的量子点；(c) 氮空位（N-V）色心的原子结构，其中氮原子和碳-13原子在金刚石晶格中的位置被详细标注。这些系统用于研究单自旋动力学和量子计算应用。

image_title: 量子点与氮空位中心的结构示意图
description: 该图片展示了三种不同类型的量子系统：(a) 电荷感应的量子点，其中电子被电场限制在二维电子气（2DEG）中；(b) 自组装的量子点，由InGaAs和GaAs材料构成；(c) 氮空位（N-V）色心的原子结构，包含一个替代性的氮原子和一个缺失的碳原子。这些系统用于研究单自旋系统的相干性和控制，是量子计算中的关键组件。

image_title: Kane架构的量子计算示意图
description: 该图片展示了基于硅材料的量子计算架构，具体为Kane架构。图中显示了磷-31（31P）杂质原子嵌入在纯同位素硅-28（28Si）基底中，周围有金属门（A-gates 和 J-gates）用于控制电子波函数。电子通过与磷核之间的强费米接触超精细耦合影响核自旋状态，从而实现量子逻辑操作。此外，图中标注了交流磁场（B_ac ~ 10^-3 T）、直流磁场（B_dc ~ 2 T）以及低温环境（T ~ 100 mK），这些条件对于维持量子态的相干性和执行量子操作至关重要。

image_title: 超导量子比特的电路模型与能级示意图
description: 该图片展示了超导量子比特的电路模型及其能级结构。图 (a) 是一个最小化的超导量子比特电路模型，其中包含约瑟夫森结（标记为 X）和电容 C。图 (b)-(d) 分别展示了电荷、通量和相位量子比特的势能 U(F) 和能级分布，红色曲线表示势能，黑色线条表示能级。图 (e)-(h) 是超导量子比特的显微图像，包括电荷量子比特（Cooper 对盒）、Transmon、通量量子比特和相位量子比特的物理结构，这些结构由铝薄膜制成，约瑟夫森结由 Al2O3 隧穿势垒构成。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing_images/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000000_3eda3c18d08392dcad487b7d10c2cf922d49ad21af246f95a693fb6cee053c78.png
image_title: 量子化学与量子计算的依赖关系图
description: 该图片展示了一个依赖关系图，描述了量子化学在量子计算时代的研究结构。图中分为多个部分：2.1节讨论经典计算的局限性；2.2节介绍经典近似方法，包括静态和动态问题；2.3节探讨量子模拟，同样分为静态和动态问题。进一步，3.1节涉及计算复杂性类，3.2节关注电子结构理论，3.3节研究分子振动。4.1节和4.2节分别讨论时间演化和哈密顿谱，属于容错量子计算机（FTQC）算法；5.1、5.2和5.3节分别介绍变分量子本征求解器（VQE）、混合算法和非门基方法，属于噪声中等规模量子（NISQ）设备算法。整体结构清晰地展示了不同主题之间的逻辑联系和层次关系。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing_images/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000001_23713c6c08018ce14b3ab788d64f786052154e089d209ab9f3523750c31bd5c0.png
image_title: 复杂度类之间的关系图
description: 该图片展示了不同复杂度类之间的包含关系，包括P、NP、BQP、QMA、P^#P和PH等。图中使用了Venn图的形式，直观地表示了这些复杂度类的层次结构和相互关系，反映了计算理论中问题难度的分级。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing_images/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000002_9347693162ebdbd35c63d1960b3f08c468988a4eb30fc74f22d623b89c1d09d6.png
image_title: 量子相位估计电路
description: 该图片展示了一个执行量子相位估计（QPEA）的量子电路，使用了三个辅助量子比特。电路首先对每个辅助量子比特应用Hadamard门（标记为'Had'），以创建均匀叠加态。接着，一系列受控操作U（对应于哈密顿量演化e^{-iHt}）被应用于辅助量子比特和目标量子比特之间。最后，逆量子傅里叶变换（QFT^†）用于将辅助量子比特的态转换为计算基态，从而输出目标量子态的相位信息。此电路用于从一个近似特征态中高效地提取对应的相位，是量子化学中哈密顿量模拟的重要组成部分。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing_images/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000003_f2de4804cfc1218b8ece1c29555c0d2b239ac15560b58efe4299bea1eff60fb6.png
image_title: 量子傅里叶变换电路（四量子比特）
description: 该图片展示了用于四量子比特的量子傅里叶变换（QFT）电路。电路中包含一系列的哈达玛门（Had）和受控旋转门（R_k），其中 R_k 的旋转角度为 e^(2πi/2^k)。每个量子比特从上到下依次应用一个哈达玛门，随后是受控于下方量子比特的旋转门。最终状态表示为 Eq. 30 的形式，但需要反转量子比特顺序。此电路是量子算法中的重要组成部分，常作为子程序使用，并在量子相位估计等算法中起到关键作用。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing_images/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000004_90ae22430d784f77b0153f1c2fbb253773bd850b6d7e2c121a1d504be888ab71.png
image_title: 量子化学模拟算法的时间线
description: 该图片展示了量子化学模拟算法的发展时间线，左侧列出了不同技术类别及其对应的年份和研究者，右侧则概述了这些技术在量子化学时间演化中的改进。箭头从左侧指向右侧，表示技术与改进之间的关联。颜色编码用于区分哈密顿量的表示方法：黄色代表第一量化，红色代表第二量化。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing_images/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000005_a69f9232de08f1250cb744ad0cff2eebbb082573594e0cc282a44a3f73b8c132.png
image_title: Hybrid Quantum-Classical (HQC) Framework
description: This diagram illustrates the general layout of a hybrid quantum-classical (HQC) algorithm. It shows three main steps: state preparation on a quantum circuit, measurement of the quantum state, and feedback/optimization on a classical computer. The process begins with an input state that undergoes a sequence of parametrized quantum gates to prepare a desired quantum state. Measurements are then performed on this state, and the results are passed to a classical computer for parameter optimization. This optimized set of parameters is fed back into the quantum circuit for further iterations until convergence is achieved. The diagram emphasizes the iterative nature of HQC algorithms, leveraging both quantum and classical computation strengths.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing_images/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000007_4abeabea7b9808bd0348b8786b873246e04717b6bdd2c7fe97ee70cea954b0a9.png
image_title: Quantum Autoencoder Algorithm and Classical Analog
description: The image illustrates the quantum autoencoder (QAE) algorithm alongside its classical counterpart. Part a.) shows the workflow of the QAE, where a training set of quantum states is prepared using multiple quantum data generation processes. These states are then fed into a variational circuit consisting of encoding and decoding components. The optimization routine updates parameters to minimize the loss function based on measurements from either the trash state or the final decoded state. Once trained, the encoding circuit compresses n-qubit states into m-qubit states (m ≤ n). Part b.) depicts a classical 4-2-4 autoencoder for comparison, highlighting the analogous structure between quantum and classical autoencoders.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing_images/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000008_032c9c8719a7cac24bd76afee8afab73edde0c8c72588ee0660a6f38a5e784ef.png
image_title: 分子势能面与量子采样模拟
description: 图片展示了分子势能面（左图）和基于线性光学的量子采样模拟装置（右图）。左图中，横轴表示核坐标，纵轴表示能量，红色曲线代表势能面，橙色区域表示基态波函数。不同能级用水平虚线表示，标记为 $v_0, v_1, \ldots, v_n$ 和 $v'_0, v'_1, \ldots, v'_m$。右图展示了一个线性光学装置，用于实现Doktorov变换并进行光子数采样，底部的光子模式表示输入状态，蓝色结构表示光子路径和干涉过程，最终输出FCP（频率计数率）谱。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing_images/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000009_cd062cb2bb7309154746ca40e897fd8b45729f9fbe994bde3d812505c860cb0c.png
image_title: Bravyi-Kitaev 映射中的 β 矩阵递归定义
description: 图片展示了 Bravyi-Kitaev 映射中用于定义编码的 β 矩阵的递归公式。矩阵 β_{r+1} 是一个分块矩阵，其中左上角为 1，右上角为全 1 的行向量，中间部分为 β_r 的对角线结构，其余元素为 0。该公式是 Bravyi-Kitaev 编码的核心组成部分，用于将费米子算符映射到量子比特算符，确保算符的权重为 O(log N)，这对于量子模拟至关重要。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing_images/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000010_3c92c2b5767911c9e7ecda36a75a764a49cdcc9239a8cd1f2ef0ab7e2d7cd5c6.png
image_title: Bravyi-Kitaev Transformation Matrix for N=2
description: The image shows the matrix β₃, which defines the Bravyi-Kitaev transformation for a system with N=2 spin-orbitals. This matrix is used to transform Jordan-Wigner product states into Bravyi-Kitaev product states. The matrix has dimensions 8x8 and contains binary entries (0s and 1s), reflecting the recursive definition of the Bravyi-Kitaev encoding. This transformation is crucial for reducing the weight of creation and annihilation operators in quantum simulations, making it more efficient for quantum computation.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing_images/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000011_dad070f8bcae2f4a90ed420535d4518dc17f38326efbf37e3c66abcdb110839f.png
image_title: 分子氢的解离曲线
description: 该图展示了在最小基组（STO-6G）下，分子氢的解离曲线。横轴表示原子间距离（以埃为单位），纵轴表示电子基态能量（以哈特里为单位）。图中显示了使用全配置相互作用（FCI）方法计算得到的基态能量随原子间距离变化的趋势。随着原子间距离的增加，能量逐渐趋于一个稳定值，反映了分子氢的解离过程。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing_images/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000012_9255b3c510b872ccd95718933c343697fb3fc25403c4e9a79f7f3c880c81e1c1.png
image_title: 量子计算的电路模型示意图
description: 该图片展示了量子计算的基本步骤，包括初始化量子比特、应用量子门操作以及测量量子比特。图中显示了多个量子比特从初始状态 |0⟩ 开始，经过一系列量子门操作（表示为 U），最终进行测量以获取结果。时间箭头指示了这些步骤的时间顺序，体现了量子计算的流程。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing_images/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000013_af34fba40fc5e21beb91a068680e4d32a83257204c6a188cd8ce3aaba4d54ae2.png
image_title: VQE Variational Circuit for Molecular Hydrogen
description: This image depicts a quantum circuit used in the Variational Quantum Eigensolver (VQE) algorithm for simulating molecular hydrogen. The circuit includes quantum gates such as Yπ/2, -Yπ/2, Xπ, -Xπ/2, Zθ, and Xπ/2 applied to qubits initialized in the |0⟩ state. The circuit is designed to prepare a parametrized trial quantum state by applying a variational circuit U(θ) to an initial reference state. The parameter θ is adjusted iteratively using a classical optimization routine to minimize the energy expectation value with respect to the Hamiltonian. This circuit is part of the process to approximate the ground state energy of molecular hydrogen using VQE.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing_images/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000014_cbd69ea2ce7c94198322e8e37f40a4ded6cbd4c93b44967e06b1a13c09f3c7a2.png
image_title: VQE vs FCI Dissociation Profile for Molecular Hydrogen
description: This graph compares the dissociation profiles of molecular hydrogen computed using the Full Configuration Interaction (FCI) method and the Variational Quantum Eigensolver (VQE) algorithm. The x-axis represents the bond length in angstroms, while the y-axis shows the energy in hartrees. The VQE results are plotted as red dots, and they closely match the FCI results (black dots), demonstrating the accuracy of VQE in approximating the ground state energy across different bond lengths.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing_images/Quantum Chemistry in the Age of Quantum computing-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000015_50ee8f9c314f81cfbad2d284d9812e3a83661bca32c8e525f226a412f3c97063.png
image_title: VQE Energy Expectation vs. Variational Parameter
description: This plot illustrates the energy expectation as a function of the variational parameter \(\theta\) for a quantum system, likely in the context of the Variational Quantum Eigensolver (VQE). The plot shows two curves: one representing the exact energy expectation and another representing the estimated energy with a finite number of samples (\(n_{samples} = 100\)). The x-axis represents the variational parameter \(\theta\), while the y-axis represents the energy in Hartree units. The curve with finite samples exhibits some noise compared to the exact curve, highlighting the impact of sampling errors on the energy estimation.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum entanglement beyond Gaussian criteria_images/Quantum entanglement beyond Gaussian criteria-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000000_5e56b31c75b44ae09efc545a9d8912374e47f95aa7119a7528bd1f9ab40b42a7.png
image_title: 实验装置图：非高斯纠缠态的产生与测量
description: 该图片展示了用于产生和测量非高斯纠缠态的实验装置。He-Cd激光器（441.6 nm）作为泵浦光源，通过一个玻璃片和柱面透镜聚焦到β-钡硼酸盐（BBO）晶体上，生成纠缠光子对。晶体产生的光子经过空间滤波器（G），并通过光学成像系统测量位置和横向波矢分布。整个装置旨在验证非高斯纠缠态的存在，并通过特定的实验参数设置确保纠缠特性超越了高斯标准。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum entanglement beyond Gaussian criteria_images/Quantum entanglement beyond Gaussian criteria-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000001_68747d9fd969a3eeaf1ada51ba7169a876fbe3a9514ae07ff5d70b914b6610c7.png
image_title: Coincidence Counts for Joint Probability Distributions
description: This image shows the two-dimensional scans of detectors corresponding to joint probability distributions P_xa(, xb), P_xa(, pb), P_pa(, xb), and P_pa(, pb). The inset in each panel displays theoretical simulations calculated from Eq. 6. These measurements are performed on a discrete two-dimensional grid, where moments are obtained via summation over all measured points of P_wa(, wb). The data represents coincidence counts proportional to each probability distribution, demonstrating the experimental setup's ability to test second-order and higher-order separability criteria.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum entanglement beyond Gaussian criteria_images/Quantum entanglement beyond Gaussian criteria-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000002_75bbfeeaf973bb49a8ee5534a492120472f0b23222ac8625bc5d1894b23e260f.png
image_title: 实验测量的联合概率分布 P_{xa}(x_a, x_b)
description: 该图片展示了实验中测量的联合概率分布 P_{xa}(x_a, x_b)，其中 x_a 和 x_b 分别代表两个光子的位置测量。图中显示了二维扫描结果，颜色强度表示不同位置的概率密度。右下角的插图是理论模拟，基于 Eq. 6 计算得到，与实验数据进行对比。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum entanglement beyond Gaussian criteria_images/Quantum entanglement beyond Gaussian criteria-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000003_c0810c16ea60f483eb781fa2dd75bdfbd47bebbec62cf2d341d2976cc619ab34.png
image_title: Joint Probability Distribution P_{pa}(, xb)
description: This image shows the two-dimensional joint probability distribution P_{pa}(, xb), which represents the correlation between the transverse wave vector (p_a) and position (x_b) measurements of entangled photons. The distribution is visualized as a heatmap, with brighter regions indicating higher probabilities. The inset in the top-right corner displays a theoretical simulation of the distribution, calculated from Eq. 6, for comparison with the experimental data. This figure is part of a series illustrating different joint probability distributions used to test separability criteria in the context of non-Gaussian entanglement.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum entanglement beyond Gaussian criteria_images/Quantum entanglement beyond Gaussian criteria-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000004_5be88c974e4875ccc89cd5f5018b46e441a33265222b8561745b61b91b003174.png
image_title: Joint Probability Distribution in Momentum Space
description: This image depicts the joint probability distribution of the transverse wave vectors (momentum space) for entangled photons, specifically showing P_{pa}( , pb). The plot illustrates the correlation between the momentum components pa and pb of the two entangled photons. The inset provides a theoretical simulation based on Eq. 6, validating the experimental results. This visualization is crucial for understanding the non-Gaussian nature of the entanglement observed in the experiment.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum entanglement beyond Gaussian criteria_images/Quantum entanglement beyond Gaussian criteria-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000005_68f78beca3315afcdcdd3cbcd3d5908704233d88780cd81be258b06d5f2cda11.png
image_title: Higher-Order Criterion Violation
description: This image depicts a plot showing the violation of a higher-order separability criterion as a function of the scaling parameter r. The blue curve represents the left-hand side of Eq. 5, which is negative within a specific range of r values (approximately 0.27 < r < 0.69), indicating a clear violation of the separability criterion. The shaded gray regions represent the experimental error estimated through error propagation of Poissonian photon counting statistics and finite detection aperture sizes. The minimum value obtained is -1.0 ± 0.2 at r ≈ 0.48, demonstrating genuine non-Gaussian entanglement.

image_title: Sulfonium Cation Electronic Structure Simulation
description: This image illustrates the results of a quantum chemistry simulation focusing on the ground- and excited-state properties of the sulfonium cation (H3S+). The simulation was performed using a superconducting quantum processor, specifically the IBM Falcon architecture. The visualization likely depicts molecular orbitals, energy levels, or other electronic structure data, highlighting the static and dynamical properties of the molecule. This study is significant for understanding photo-dissociation processes and fragmentation pathways in light-sensitive compounds, such as those used in photolithography.

image_title: H3S+ 分子的同解和异解断裂路径
description: 图片展示了 H3S+ 分子在单个 SH 键断裂时的两种可能路径：同解断裂（homolytic cleavage）和异解断裂（heterolytic cleavage）。在同解断裂中，SH 键中的两个电子被平均分配到 H2S 和 H 中，形成两个自由基。在异解断裂中，两个电子都被一个部分占据，形成闭壳层产物 H2S 和 H+。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum chemistry simulation of ground- and excited-state properties of the sulfonium cation on a superconducting quantum processor - chemical science_images/Quantum chemistry simulation of ground- and excited-state properties of the sulfonium cation on a superconducting quantum processor - chemical science-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000003_0edd7c2bc8a9e254a1ed7f2f1eeef45b4bc16e55a17551438220938a2b79993a.png
image_title: 量子电路与量子比特布局
description: 该图展示了量子化学模拟中涉及的量子电路和量子比特布局。具体包括：(a) 活跃空间轨道的表示，通过分子结构展示；(b) 参数化量子电路的示意图，包含初始状态准备、参数化两量子比特门（hop-gates）以及测量步骤；(c) 初始态的制备过程，包括计算基态和叠加态的生成；(d) hop-gate 的分解，展示其由单量子比特门和 cX 门构成；(e) 量子比特测量操作；(f) 量子比特在 IBM Kolkata 设备上的布局，显示了量子比特之间的线性拓扑连接。此图是量子化学模拟中量子算法实现的关键部分，用于描述电子结构问题的量子处理流程。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum chemistry simulation of ground- and excited-state properties of the sulfonium cation on a superconducting quantum processor - chemical science_images/Quantum chemistry simulation of ground- and excited-state properties of the sulfonium cation on a superconducting quantum processor - chemical science-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000004_1ff4a057057b5aa3f9b61befa6c9269a571d2911bcef5c84e6b8ab22994342ea.png
image_title: 图3：H3S+离子在键断裂过程中的基态能量和部分原子电荷
description: 该图展示了H3S+离子在不同键长（R）下的基态性质，包括总能量和部分原子电荷。左侧的子图（a-d）显示了总能量（E_total）与参考值（如FCI）的偏差，以及不同计算方法（如SCF、statevector、FCI、qasm和硬件模拟）的结果对比。右侧的子图（e-h）则描绘了硫原子（S）和氢原子（H）的部分原子电荷随键长的变化，使用Mulliken人口分析基于meta-Lowdin原子轨道计算得出。图中还比较了噪声模型和误差校正后的量子硬件结果（ibm_kolkata），以及无噪声的模拟结果。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum chemistry simulation of ground- and excited-state properties of the sulfonium cation on a superconducting quantum processor - chemical science_images/Quantum chemistry simulation of ground- and excited-state properties of the sulfonium cation on a superconducting quantum processor - chemical science-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000005_bbb7c10cd7ee4894bd177a82c72ab4ee0e95c613e151f658e96e1e5c015a8279.png
image_title: Dipole Spectral Functions at Various Bond Lengths
description: This image depicts the dipole spectral functions (S(ω)) for different bond lengths (R) of a molecular system, comparing results from Full Configuration Interaction (FCI), statevector simulation, qasm simulation with error mitigation (em), and quantum hardware (ibm_kolkata) with error mitigation. The x-axis represents energy in electron volts (hω [eV]), while the y-axis shows the spectral function intensity (S(ω) [a.u.]). Four panels correspond to bond lengths R = 0.757 Å, 1.357 Å, 2.057 Å, and 3.957 Å, illustrating how the spectral peaks evolve with increasing bond length. The FCI results are shown in blue, statevector simulations in green, qasm simulations with error mitigation in orange, and ibm_kolkata hardware results with error mitigation in red.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum chemistry simulation of ground- and excited-state properties of the sulfonium cation on a superconducting quantum processor - chemical science_images/Quantum chemistry simulation of ground- and excited-state properties of the sulfonium cation on a superconducting quantum processor - chemical science-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000006_7c58315f532f2ffa9327a5716327c73522bd90d436a0c77139400267b5bb61a8.png
image_title: H3S+ 离子的基态和激发态性质模拟
description: 该图展示了 H3S+ 离子在不同方法下的基态和激发态能量以及部分原子电荷随键长变化的情况。图中包含四个子图：(a) 和 (b) 分别显示了四种低能单重态（左）和三重态（右）状态的总能量，包括从 FCI（蓝色线条）、经典模拟器（绿色线条，橙色符号用于 statevector 和 qasm）以及量子硬件（ibm_kolkata，红色符号）计算的结果。(c) 和 (d) 则展示了在单重态（左）和三重态（右）激发态下，离开的氢原子的部分原子电荷随 SH 键长的变化，同样使用 QSE 方法，并基于 EF 波函数进行单电子和双电子计算，采用 FCI（蓝色线条）、经典模拟器（绿色线条，橙色符号用于 statevector 和 qasm），以及量子硬件（ibm_kolkata，红色符号）。深浅颜色分别表示大键长区域的低能和高能状态。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum chemistry simulation of ground- and excited-state properties of the sulfonium cation on a superconducting quantum processor - chemical science_images/Quantum chemistry simulation of ground- and excited-state properties of the sulfonium cation on a superconducting quantum processor - chemical science-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000007_6ffd4b0839ecb08e579943b3ea22ee93c3807b4b12d48d7a64a42dee43a6d5b1.png
image_title: 误差缓解对基态性质的影响
description: 该图展示了不同模拟方法（包括量子硬件、噪声无的 qasm 模拟器、带有读出误差缓解和完全误差缓解的 qasm 模拟器）在计算基态能量、总自旋、粒子数以及原子电荷时的偏差。具体而言，图中比较了从 EF 波函数出发的基态性质（左列）与在 EF 波函数上叠加单电子和双电子激发的 QSE 方法（右列）。横轴表示键长 R，纵轴分别表示基态能量差、总自旋平方差、粒子数差以及原子电荷差。图中的不同颜色和符号代表不同的模拟方法及其误差缓解策略，显示了噪声和硬件模拟结果与精确值之间的偏差，突出了误差缓解技术对提高模拟精度的重要性。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum chemistry simulation of ground- and excited-state properties of the sulfonium cation on a superconducting quantum processor - chemical science_images/Quantum chemistry simulation of ground- and excited-state properties of the sulfonium cation on a superconducting quantum processor - chemical science-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000008_359807ad3a13e299ead5359dd325a4ca375bc28ff898da774925e5b67c32aaac.png
image_title: Error Mitigation Effects on Excited-State Energies
description: This figure illustrates the impact of error mitigation techniques on the accuracy of excited-state energy calculations for a molecular system. It compares the deviations between statevector simulations, noiseless quantum assembly (qasm), noisy qasm with and without error mitigation, and quantum hardware (ibm_kolkata) results for various excited states (S1, T1, S2, T2). The x-axis represents the internuclear distance R in Å, while the y-axis shows the energy differences ΔE from exact diagonalization values. Different error mitigation strategies, such as readout error mitigation (roem) and full error mitigation (em), are highlighted to assess their effectiveness in reducing errors introduced by noisy simulations and quantum hardware.

description: 该图片展示了量子近似优化算法（QAOA）的核心组成部分，包括变分参数、量子电路结构以及对应的图示。图 (a) 描述了变分参数 \((\vec{\gamma}, \vec{\beta})\) 控制下的量子电路，其中包含多个层的混合门和问题哈密顿量演化操作。图 (b) 是一个五节点图的示意图，用于说明 QAOA 在解决组合优化问题时的图结构表示，节点间通过权重边连接，表示问题的约束或成本函数。

description: 该图展示了在不同参数设置下，量子近似优化算法（QAOA）的参数 γ 和 β 随迭代次数 i 的变化情况。图中包含多个子图，分别对应不同的 p 值（p=3, p=4, p=5），以及一个额外的子图展示 p=7 的情况。每个子图中的点和误差条表示参数值及其不确定性，横轴为迭代次数 i，纵轴为归一化后的参数值（γ/π 和 β/π）。

description: 该图展示了量子近似优化算法（QAOA）在不同参数 p 下的性能表现。图中使用了三种不同的方法进行比较：FOURIER 方法、1000 次随机初始化（RI）运行的平均值以及 1000 次 RI 运行中的最佳结果。纵坐标表示误差（1 - r），横坐标表示参数 p。图中标记为三角形的点代表 1000 次 RI 运行的平均值，标记为圆圈的点代表最佳结果，而标记为叉号的点代表 FOURIER 方法的结果。

description: This image compares the performance of the Quantum Approximate Optimization Algorithm (QAOA) with adiabatic quantum annealing (QA). The plots illustrate the ground state and excited state populations, highlighting the differences in behavior between QAOA and adiabatic QA under various conditions.

image_title: 量子近似优化算法（QAOA）的性能分析
description: 该图展示了量子近似优化算法（QAOA）在不同参数设置下的性能表现，包括能量差异、有效耦合强度、瞬时本征态分布以及与量子退火的对比。图中包含多个子图：(a) 显示了随迭代次数变化的能量差异；(b) 展示了不同误差水平下能量差异的变化；(c) 对比了QAOA与量子退火在不同温度下的性能；(d) 描述了有效耦合强度随时间的变化；(e) 绘制了瞬时本征态分布随时间的变化。这些结果有助于理解QAOA的机制及其在近似设备上的实现效果。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum error correction below the surface - nature_images/Quantum error correction below the surface - nature-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000001_67530630d9aacb53e6a49f53777cf4dfe99305956676536c46d6e874b8664ff1.png
image_title: Surface Code Performance and Logical Error Suppression
description: This image illustrates the performance of a surface code quantum error correction scheme on a 105-qubit processor. Panel (a) shows a schematic of a distance-7 surface code, with data qubits (gold), measure qubits (blue), and leakage removal qubits (green). Panel (b) presents cumulative distributions of error probabilities for various operations, including single-qubit gates (red), CZ gates (black), idle data qubits (gold), measurement identification errors (blue), and weight-4 detection probabilities (teal). Panel (c) depicts the logical error probability over time for different code distances (d = 3, 5, 7), showing exponential suppression as the number of cycles increases. Panel (d) compares the logical error per cycle against the surface code distance, demonstrating that the system operates below threshold with Λ > 2 for distances up to 7. The inset in panel (d) includes simulated results alongside experimental data, confirming consistent error suppression.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum error correction below the surface - nature_images/Quantum error correction below the surface - nature-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000002_d78fbc7b69c4c5d846c337e9eef9c895b3b4c20903ecef5978466449a4e5f0bf.png
image_title: 表面码错误敏感性分析
description: 该图展示了表面码在不同参数下的逻辑错误率和检测概率的分析。图a展示了一个表面码电路的一个周期，重点关注一个数据量子比特和一个测量量子比特的操作序列，包括CZ门、Hadamard门、测量、重置以及动态解耦等操作，并标记了注入的相干错误和DQLR（动态量子泄漏复位）过程。图b显示了逻辑错误率随检测概率的变化，分别针对距离为3、5和7的代码，揭示了逻辑错误与物理错误之间的关系。图c提供了基于组件错误和模拟的表面码误差预算，详细列出了不同类型的误差贡献，如CZ门错误、数据量子比特空闲错误、测量错误、泄漏错误以及额外未建模的误差。图d比较了有无DQLR时逻辑错误率随量子纠错循环次数的变化，表明DQLR对降低逻辑错误的有效性。图e通过重复实验评估了性能稳定性，对比了距离为3和5的代码在不同时间长度下的逻辑性能，展示了逻辑错误率随时间的稳定性。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum error correction below the surface - nature_images/Quantum error correction below the surface - nature-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000003_757baca799a5cce9a5ad1f3240005e7723a99b612c7e20e6142d303ff80f45d0.png
image_title: 高距离重复码中的错误缩放
description: 该图展示了在不同代码距离（d）下，逻辑错误率随时间的缩放情况。图a显示了逻辑错误率每周期（ε_d）与代码距离（d）的关系，表明随着代码距离的增加，逻辑错误率显著降低。图b描绘了检测概率随时间的变化，其中不同颜色代表不同的四分位数范围，反映了检测概率的时间动态特性。图c和d进一步分析了逻辑错误率与物理错误率、代码距离以及平均检测概率（P_det）之间的关系，验证了理论预测的误差抑制规律。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum error correction below the surface - nature_images/Quantum error correction below the surface - nature-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000004_e3cec4e74d624054f43b6a685add366f2808d7e11ec81934b20b8e4efe69f6d3.png
image_title: Real-Time Decoding Performance and Latency Analysis
description: This figure illustrates the performance and latency characteristics of a real-time decoding system for quantum error correction. Panel (a) shows a schematic of the streaming decoding algorithm, where the decoding problem is divided into blocks processed by different threads. Panel (b) depicts the task graph for processing these blocks, highlighting how detections are matched to block boundaries and fused downstream. Panel (c) presents the decoder latency versus experiment duration, with blue points representing full-shot latencies and yellow histograms showing subshot latencies for each ten-cycle block. Panel (d) compares the accuracy of three decoders—real-time (RT), ensembled matching synthesis (Ens.), and neural network (NN)—for the surface code, demonstrating that the real-time decoder maintains high accuracy despite its speed constraints.

image_title: 量子纠错表面下的原理示意图
description: 这张图片展示了量子纠错技术在超导量子比特中的应用，特别是如何通过表面码（Surface Code）来延长量子比特的寿命并抑制错误。图中可能包括了量子纠错的逻辑结构、表面码的几何布局以及纠错过程中的关键步骤，如错误检测和纠正机制。此外，图片可能还涉及了量子纠错算法的效率提升，例如通过并行化或优化纠错电路设计来提高纠错性能。

image_title: 量子误差缓解的估计器比较
description: 该图展示了未缓解（Unmitigated estimator）和缓解后（Mitigated estimator）的估计器在输出值上的概率密度分布。橙色曲线代表未缓解的估计器，蓝色虚线代表缓解后的估计器。图中还标注了理想值（Ideal value: Tr(Oρ)），并用红色箭头指向其位置，表明缓解后的估计器更接近理想值。

image_title: 量子电路故障率与期望值的关系
description: 该图展示了量子电路的故障率（λ）与期望值之间的关系。横轴表示电路故障率，纵轴表示期望值。图中显示随着电路故障率的增加，期望值呈现下降趋势，并且用虚线拟合了这一趋势。图中标记了几个关键点，表明在不同故障率下的期望值变化情况。

image_title: 量子态的迹运算与张量积示意图
description: 该图片展示了量子态的迹运算和张量积的概念。左侧是一个包含多个量子态（用 \rho 表示）和一个测量操作符（用 O 表示）的电路图，其中 S_3 和 O_1 分别表示特定的量子门或操作。右侧是等价的数学表达式，表示为 Tr[S_3 O_1 \rho^{\otimes 3}]，即对三个相同量子态 \rho 的张量积进行迹运算，最终结果为 Tr[O \rho^3]。

image_title: 量子纠错中的多副本测量示意图
description: 该图展示了量子纠错过程中，利用多个副本（copy 1 和 copy 2）进行测量以检测和纠正错误的原理。图中包含两个主要部分：左侧表示两个副本，右侧则展示了对每个副本进行多次测量（N 次），并标记为 \(\widetilde{S}_2^{(1)}, \widetilde{S}_2^{(2)}, \dots, \widetilde{S}_2^{(N)}\)。这些测量结果用于评估和修正量子态的误差。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum error mitigation - reviews of modern physics_images/Quantum error mitigation - reviews of modern physics-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000004_897ef5248a4ba1448aa973b8211c71127672b26756b26a3b4d595f63a7a228c3.png
image_title: 量子错误缓解流程图
description: 该图片展示了一个量子错误缓解的流程图，描述了如何通过经典模拟和噪声硬件运行电路来优化误差缓解估计。流程包括：1) 在噪声量子硬件上运行主电路（Primary circuit）和训练电路（Training circuits），获取噪声期望值；2) 将这些噪声期望值输入到误差缓解函数中，生成参数化的误差缓解估计；3) 使用经典模拟计算无噪声期望值，并通过损失函数进行优化，最终得到最优参数和优化后的误差缓解估计。

image_title: 量子电路合成中的条件生成流程
description: 该图展示了使用扩散模型进行量子电路合成时的条件生成过程。具体包括：1) 文本提示（text prompts）通过预训练的CLIP编码器转换为连续表示，用于指导扩散模型的生成；2) 单位矩阵（unitaries）通过专门的编码器（U-enc）转换为另一种连续表示，用于特定任务如单位元编译。整个流程强调了文本和数学输入如何被转化为适合扩散模型处理的格式，以实现量子电路的高效生成。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models_images/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000002_944b0369140117637266d442c5b200dd1f599961104abf850ac9c49f39e52803.png
image_title: Diffusion Model Training Pipeline
description: This image illustrates the training process of a denoising diffusion model (DM) for quantum circuit synthesis. It shows how the model learns to predict and remove noise from corrupted quantum circuit representations. The pipeline includes: (1) A dataset of clean quantum circuits, (2) Adding Gaussian noise to create a noisy dataset, (3) Feeding the noisy data into a U-Net architecture, which predicts the noise present in each sample, and (4) Subtracting the predicted noise to denoise the input samples. The conditioning vector 'c' guides the model during training, ensuring that the generated circuits align with the desired characteristics.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models_images/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000003_e6b99537f3578681743cb44c9d2c637146d9ac120dd0686fc846f2029c5c1b9c.png
image_title: Inference Process in Quantum Circuit Synthesis
description: This image illustrates the inference process of a denoising diffusion model (DM) used for quantum circuit synthesis. It shows how a completely noisy tensor (representing pure noise) is iteratively denoised by a U-Net architecture, guided by conditioning information (c = [c_t, c_u, ...]). After k steps of iterative denoising, the model generates high-quality new quantum circuits. The diagram emphasizes the transformation from noisy input to clean, meaningful output through the DM's generative capabilities.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models_images/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000004_cb230b52bb3588f52125b20c12289bc97f225ee9d9ac2017198279e79f2943d4.png
image_title: Entanglement Generation Performance Analysis
description: This image presents a comprehensive analysis of the performance of a model in generating quantum circuits that produce states with specific entanglement, as measured by their Schmidt rank vector (SRV). The figure includes multiple subplots: (a) shows the accuracy of the model versus the number of entangled qubits for circuits of different sizes; (b) displays a confusion matrix comparing input and generated SRVs for 5-qubit circuits; (c) illustrates the mean accuracy over all SRVs versus the number of samples used for fine-tuning the model for 9 and 10-qubit circuits; (d-e) show the percentage of new and distinct generated circuits across all SRVs and qubit sizes; and (f) depicts the model accuracy versus the input tensor size (which determines the maximum gate count) for 5-qubit circuits with varying numbers of entangled qubits. The results highlight the model's ability to generalize beyond the training set, discover novel circuits, and maintain consistent accuracy across different tensor sizes.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models_images/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000005_8e9f696be42feae11f014561e1f8d4ba9f72f075882a27e92f058e6a2dfa63eb.png
image_title: Masking and Editing Quantum Circuits
description: This image illustrates the concepts of masking and editing in quantum circuit synthesis. Panel (a) shows masking, where a physical layout of a quantum processor (IBM Lagos QPU) is embedded as a mask to prevent gate placement in specific areas of the input tensor, ensuring adherence to the device's connectivity constraints. Panel (b) demonstrates editing, where parts of the circuit are fixed to given gates before generation, allowing for the incorporation of an initial quantum state or specific requirements. Panel (c) presents the accuracy of editing circuits from an initial SRV (State Representation Vector) to a target SRV, highlighting the fraction of successful transformations within a sample of generated circuits.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models_images/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000006_856dad28371597c5396d4556a427c92ad9d048cfcb04877c32289f2644eece2c.png
image_title: Frobenius Distance Between Target and Generated Unitaries
description: This image presents a histogram comparing the Frobenius distance between target unitaries (U_t) and generated unitaries (U_g) for two scenarios: circuits generated by the model (orange bars) and randomly generated circuits (blue bars). The x-axis represents the Frobenius distance, while the y-axis shows the percentage of cases. The plot demonstrates that the model-generated circuits achieve a lower Frobenius distance compared to randomly generated circuits, indicating higher accuracy in compiling unitaries into circuits. This suggests that the model is effectively heading in the right direction, even when it does not perfectly succeed in all cases.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models_images/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000007_c10f55132003b8232b38e3c8e08b991a58d9c96f537c94e5a5695459db1ed566.png
image_title: Unitary Compilation Accuracy Distribution
description: This image shows a histogram (a) representing the frequency of distinct correct circuits generated per unitary. The x-axis indicates the number of distinct correct circuits, while the y-axis represents the frequency. The distribution highlights how often the model successfully identifies multiple valid circuits for a given unitary, demonstrating its ability to generate diverse solutions. This is relevant in the context of quantum circuit synthesis, where finding multiple equivalent circuits can provide flexibility for practical implementations.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models_images/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000008_b00ad84b90d33a37ad9dbbb8789d80d8fe4effe364a9d029d4d6496f9ad63cfb.png
image_title: 量子电路的转译（Transpiling）
description: 该图片展示了量子电路的转译过程，从一个初始电路（initial circuit）通过一系列变换生成最终电路。初始电路由特定的门操作（如H、X、CX等）组成，经过转译后，电路结构发生变化，但仍保持功能等价性。图中显示了不同阶段的电路布局，包括初始电路和最终电路，以及中间的转换步骤，体现了如何在给定的硬件约束下优化量子电路的设计。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models_images/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000009_b1d58c35cd7467bb3026632c041c28eb035b258bfa1e5531c1bbc47d5a55cddf.png
image_title: Gate Embedding for Single and Multi-Qubit Gates
description: This image illustrates the process of embedding quantum gates into vector representations. It shows two examples: (1) A single-qubit gate (Hadamard gate, labeled 'H') is mapped to a vector \(\mathbf{v}_1\), which lies along the positive y-axis in a 2D coordinate system. (2) A multi-qubit gate (represented by a control-target structure with a '+' symbol and a black dot) is mapped to another vector \(\mathbf{v}_2\), which lies along the negative y-axis. This visualization demonstrates how different gates are assigned unique vector embeddings, which can be used for encoding quantum circuits into continuous tensors.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models_images/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000010_26ee818bcf0902c36ce5ed4c7721a695bd23feab52dc62e9fad8bd91593acc59.png
image_title: Quantum Circuit Encoding Pipeline
description: This image illustrates the process of encoding and decoding quantum circuits using a diffusion model. The pipeline includes tokenization of quantum circuits, transformation into continuous tensors via embeddings, and decoding back to circuits using cosine similarity. The diagram shows how an input quantum circuit is first tokenized based on a predefined vocabulary, then transformed into a tensor representation. Decoding involves comparing the generated tensor with existing token embeddings to reconstruct the circuit. The process is bidirectional, allowing for both encoding and decoding operations.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models_images/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000011_ba9929e510f1bbca6d7e19401bafffbe0058c21bd4e9c513dc8666a88cac82bd.png
image_title: Entanglement Generation Dataset Distribution
description: This image illustrates the distribution characteristics of the training dataset used for the entanglement generation task. It is divided into two parts: (a) shows the number of distinct circuits as a function of the number of qubits, indicating that the number of distinct circuits increases with the number of qubits. (b) depicts the distribution of circuit lengths, which are multiples of the U-Net scaling factor 4, due to length padding applied during preprocessing. The data reflects the balanced dataset created according to the parameters specified in Extended Data Table 1 and the balancing procedure described in the Methods section.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models_images/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000012_45c67b019a438eca494737b786c9c7fce66f6acd0492574b2eac464c721e3d0e.png
image_title: U-Net 和 Unitary Encoder 架构图
description: 该图片展示了用于量子电路合成的机器学习架构，包括 U-Net 和 Unitary Encoder 的详细结构。图 (a) 描述了 U-Net 的架构，包含卷积层、残差连接、2D 位置编码、Transformer 编码器和解码器块等组件。图 (b) 展示了 Unitary Encoder 的架构，同样包含卷积层、2D 位置编码以及 Transformer 编码器块，并引入了下采样和上采样操作。这些架构被设计用于处理量子电路的生成和单元矩阵的编码任务，结合了全局注意力机制和位置编码以捕获非局部信息。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models_images/Quantum circuit synthesis with diffusion models-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000013_25f82bc9efed90323291083c42d61ab25d15ea0f3398989d4e1b741befa85623.png
image_title: 量子电路长度分布与纠缠量子比特数的关系
description: 该图展示了不同数量的纠缠量子比特（entangled qubits）对应的量子电路长度分布。图中包含三个子图：(a) 显示了不同纠缠量子比特数的电路长度分布，(b) 和 (c) 分别展示了在最大门数限制为 16 和 24 的情况下生成的电路长度分布。横轴表示电路长度（gate count），纵轴表示百分比（Percentage）。颜色编码代表不同的纠缠量子比特数，从 0 到 5 不等。这些分布揭示了在不同参数设置下生成的量子电路的统计特性，有助于理解模型在处理不同规模和复杂度的量子电路时的行为。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification_images/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000001_014ccefbca809b22ee6bc13fedc76bc92834a48182e3a504b5053148242ce0d0.png
image_title: 量子卷积神经网络的结构示意图
description: 该图片展示了量子卷积神经网络（QCNN）的结构，强调了其分层设计和参数化量子电路的特性。图中可能包括了量子门操作、量子态的演化以及不同层之间的连接方式，体现了QCNN如何通过类似经典卷积神经网络的层级结构来处理数据，并利用量子纠缠等特性进行模式识别和分类任务。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification_images/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000002_e4e5e687bdf8e8f642ed205137e2bcccdbaf8f197f14a37625acf315c7fd4170.png
image_title: 量子卷积神经网络 (QCNN) 的架构示意图
description: 该图片展示了量子卷积神经网络 (QCNN) 的架构，用于经典数据分类。图中包含三个主要部分：绿色矩形区域表示量子数据编码（Data Encoding），蓝色圆角矩形区域表示卷积层（Convolution），红色圆形区域表示池化层（Pooling）。整个电路由多个量子比特组成，每个量子比特初始状态为 |0⟩。卷积层使用参数化的两量子比特门对相邻量子比特进行操作，而池化层则对卷积结果进行降维处理。最终，经过多层处理后的量子态被测量并输出到经典计算机中，以最小化成本函数 C(θ)。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification_images/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000003_f783d2131761ce8e543b4d9e123e3ac9fecc18db7d8c2eace63d302d7b494755.png
image_title: Quantum Convolutional Circuits
description: This image illustrates various parameterized quantum circuits designed for use in the convolutional layers of a Quantum Convolutional Neural Network (QCNN). The circuits are labeled from (a) to (i), each representing a different configuration of single-qubit and two-qubit gate operations. These circuits include rotations around the Bloch sphere axes (Ry, Rx, Rz), Hadamard gates (H), and arbitrary single-qubit gates (U3). The circuits are structured to balance expressibility and entangling capability, with some inspired by past studies on four-qubit parameterized quantum circuits. Circuit 9 represents an arbitrary SU(4) gate, which is particularly significant for its versatility in implementing complex quantum operations.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification_images/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000004_24fad97e537b0f0770df5ff9ee6cd087e464cf1f358205d08d73dadbd4953a1e.png
image_title: Pooling Layer Parameterized Quantum Circuit
description: This image depicts a parameterized quantum circuit used in the pooling layer of a quantum convolutional neural network (QCNN). The circuit consists of two controlled rotations: Rz(θ1) and Rx(θ2), each activated based on the state of the control qubit (indicated by filled or open circles). The control qubit is traced out after the gate operations to reduce the dimensionality from two qubits to one. This circuit is designed to apply parameterized quantum gates to two qubits and then trace out one qubit, effectively reducing the state to a single-qubit representation.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification_images/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000005_f6ea9660e79ac52237e54ec98ab166cb2c65cfbfd7fe63a489f404799a9ec9ca.png
image_title: Pooling Layer Quantum Circuit
description: This image depicts a parameterized quantum circuit used in the pooling layer of a quantum convolutional neural network (QCNN). The circuit consists of two controlled rotations: Rz(θ1) and Rx(θ2), each activated based on the state of the control qubit. The control qubit is traced out after the gate operations to reduce the dimensionality from two qubits to one qubit, effectively implementing the pooling operation.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification_images/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000006_f57793cd678c922f398f6323ab89f1a73f63e47f61f1b7c614056de003eb5bf4.png
image_title: 分类精度与卷积滤波器层数的关系
description: 该图展示了在MNIST和Fashion MNIST数据集上，分类精度随着卷积滤波器层数（L）的变化情况。横轴表示卷积滤波器层数（L），纵轴表示分类精度。图中使用了不同的编码方案和电路结构，包括电路2和电路9b，以及多种数据编码方式（如幅度编码、量子比特编码和密集编码）。不同颜色和线型的曲线分别对应不同的配置，例如PCA8、AutoEnc8、PCA16和AutoEnc16等。结果显示，随着卷积滤波器层数的增加，某些情况下分类精度有所提升，但并非所有情况下都表现出一致的趋势。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification_images/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000007_91deda4209bb023f16595af99a35e32edeab0d4d9f8c95477481c74ef3137264.png
image_title: 分类准确率与卷积滤波器层数的关系
description: 该图展示了在不同数据编码方案下，随着卷积滤波器层数（L）的增加，分类准确率的变化情况。横轴表示卷积滤波器层数（L），纵轴表示分类准确率。图中使用了五种不同的数据编码方案：幅度编码（AE）、PCA8、AutoEnc8、PCA16 和 AutoEnc16，每种编码方案对应一条曲线。结果显示，随着 L 的增加，某些编码方案的分类准确率显著提升，例如 AutoEnc16 在 L=3 时达到了约 90% 的准确率。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification_images/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000008_2fbc44c77262d0dc34afda52eaf2337cf3beb805dff47fd659d5ec24cf90c0cc.png
image_title: 分类准确率与卷积层数量的关系
description: 该图展示了在不同卷积层数量（L）下，使用不同参数设置的量子卷积神经网络（QCNN）对MNIST和Fashion MNIST数据集的分类准确率。横轴表示卷积层的数量（L），纵轴表示分类准确率。图中包含多条曲线，每条曲线代表不同的参数配置或编码方案，例如电路2和电路9b，以及不同的数据编码方法（如幅度编码、量子编码和密集编码）。随着卷积层数量的增加，某些配置的分类准确率表现出上升趋势，而其他配置则趋于稳定或略有下降。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification_images/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000009_a61d01b9f82a3525960a2400dfefa29088e9100a431e08ee8aa9fe34779bcf26.png
image_title: 分类精度与卷积层层数的关系
description: 该图展示了不同编码方案（包括幅度编码 AE、PCA8、AutoEnc8、PCA16 和 AutoEnc16）在不同卷积层层数 L 下的分类精度。横轴表示卷积层层数 L，纵轴表示分类精度。图中使用了不同的颜色和线型来区分不同的编码方案，显示了随着卷积层层数增加，各种编码方案的分类精度变化趋势。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification_images/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000010_014ccefbca809b22ee6bc13fedc76bc92834a48182e3a504b5053148242ce0d0.png
image_title: QCNN Circuit with Open-Boundary Condition and No Pooling Gates
description: This image depicts a quantum convolutional neural network (QCNN) circuit designed with an open-boundary condition, where no gate operations are used for pooling. The circuit structure is optimized to utilize only nearest-neighbor qubit interactions, making it particularly suitable for noisy intermediate-scale quantum (NISQ) devices with limited physical qubit connectivity. This design reduces the depth of the circuit and simplifies implementation on hardware with restricted qubit connections.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification_images/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000012_a64f8db69667e6573acfbbfe76b32a141fd2d4dfbdf9bd575112ed1b8168e91c.png
image_title: QCNN vs CNN: Cross-Entropy Loss Comparison
description: This image compares the cross-entropy loss as a function of training iterations between Quantum Convolutional Neural Networks (QCNN) and Classical Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN). The plot shows two curves: one for QCNN (in orange) and another for CNN (in blue). The x-axis represents the number of training iterations, while the y-axis represents the cross-entropy loss. The QCNN model demonstrates faster convergence and lower loss compared to the CNN model, indicating its superior performance in terms of training speed and accuracy.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification_images/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000013_014ccefbca809b22ee6bc13fedc76bc92834a48182e3a504b5053148242ce0d0.png
image_title: QCNN vs CNN: Cross-Entropy Loss Comparison
description: This image compares the cross-entropy loss as a function of training iterations for Quantum Convolutional Neural Network (QCNN) models against Classical Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) models. Specifically, it shows two cases: (a) QCNN with qubit encoding and autoencoding compared to CNN with 8 inputs and autoencoding; and (b) QCNN with dense encoding and PCA compared to CNN with 16 inputs and PCA. The results demonstrate that QCNN models converge faster than their CNN counterparts, with smaller standard deviations in both cases. This highlights the efficiency and stability of QCNN in terms of training dynamics.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification_images/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000014_7342545d991887f6e71154d74b51fe6352d3373840c29687d4bc107319575e96.png
image_title: QCNN vs CNN: Loss Comparison with PCA Encoding
description: This image compares the cross-entropy loss as a function of training iterations between a Quantum Convolutional Neural Network (QCNN) and a Classical Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) for the Fashion MNIST dataset. The QCNN is trained using dense encoding with PCA preprocessing, while the CNN uses 16 inputs with PCA preprocessing. The plot shows that the QCNN converges faster than the CNN, with lower standard deviation in its loss curve, indicating more stable training dynamics.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification_images/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000015_ab90b103ea82a4e4df432895d8efa51d6538c23041118cfe810875c031bfe37f.png
image_title: 经典卷积神经网络（CNN）结构示意图
description: 该图展示了一个经典卷积神经网络（CNN）的结构，用于与量子卷积神经网络（QCNN）进行性能比较。CNN 包含两个卷积层（Convolution 1 和 Convolution 2），每个卷积层后跟一个池化层（Pooling）。最后，经过两次卷积和池化操作后的特征被传递到一个全连接层（Fully Connected），以完成分类任务。图中使用不同颜色的矩形框表示不同的卷积核或特征图，箭头表示数据流动的方向。此结构旨在调整参数数量，使其与 QCNN 的参数数量相近，以便在公平条件下进行性能对比。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification_images/Quantum convolutional neural network for classical data classification-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000016_4ac492a45dfad8857e7331c0a956771fe7364237d2aa1dfec9d995b0a894ce6c.png
image_title: CNN架构示意图
description: 该图片展示了一个经典卷积神经网络（CNN）的架构示意图，用于与量子卷积神经网络（QCNN）进行分类性能比较。CNN的输入节点数量被调整为8个，以尽可能接近QCNN的参数数量，从而确保公平的对比。图中详细展示了CNN的结构，包括卷积层、池化层和全连接层，以及它们之间的连接方式。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum optimization using variational algorithms on near-term quantum devices_images/Quantum optimization using variational algorithms on near-term quantum devices-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000000_797fe354cbd40944844e4536d78fa64241a4b1f5eafdbef393de6464d4f63f37.png
image_title: Hybrid Quantum-Classical Computing Architecture
description: The image illustrates a hybrid quantum-classical computing architecture. On the left, classical data is represented as binary strings, symbolizing input or output data processed by classical computers. On the right, a quantum circuit is depicted with qubits labeled Q1 to Q6, connected by quantum gates (e.g., U(G)), representing the quantum processing unit. The circular arrow between the two sections indicates the iterative interaction between classical and quantum components, highlighting the variational approach where classical optimization guides the quantum computation.

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum optimization using variational algorithms on near-term quantum devices_images/Quantum optimization using variational algorithms on near-term quantum devices-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000001_395566f3fc7e29b1a3f7ebd676440b4b30910bb85248750075322901739b51d3.png
image_title: 量子体积与有效错误率的关系
description: 该图片展示了量子体积（Quantum Volume）与有效错误率（Effective Error Rate）以及物理量子比特数（Number of Qubits）之间的关系。图分为两部分：(a) 部分展示了一个示例量子电路，包含两个电路步骤，其中第二步需要不同的连接性，这在仅具有最近邻交互的量子硬件上会导致门计数增加；(b) 部分是一个热图，显示了量子体积作为有效错误率和量子比特数的函数。热图中的颜色从红色到黄色表示量子体积的变化范围，右侧的色标给出了具体的数值范围。虚线表示临界点，即当电路深度 d = 1 / (N * ε_eff) 等于量子比特数 N 时的位置。图中表明，为了显著提高量子体积，需要同时改进有效错误率和量子比特数。

url: /root/autodl-tmp/markitdown/all_scratch_without_annotation/scratch_dlc/Quantum optimization using variational algorithms on near-term quantum devices_images/Quantum optimization using variational algorithms on near-term quantum devices-with-image-refs_artifacts/image_000002_03e46aeeb184a1c4ed9608f3dc3dd15c722127690735cf82e97230aba2bf5529.png
image_title: Variational Quantum Eigensolver Workflow
description: This image illustrates the workflow of the Variational Quantum Eigensolver (VQE) method, which is a hybrid quantum-classical algorithm. The process involves mapping a fermionic problem to a qubit Hamiltonian, preparing trial states on a quantum device, measuring expectation values, and optimizing parameters classically to minimize the cost function. The classical part calculates energy and adjusts parameters θ, while the quantum part prepares trial states and measures expectation values.
